name: jelly
interpret: n.果冻；胶状物；vi.结冻；做果冻；vt.使结冻
example: 单词 jelly 的例句||||We had toast and jelly at breakfast. 我们早餐吃的是烤面包和果冻。||||The medicine was a clear jelly. 这种药是透明的胶状物。

name: lime
interpret: n.石灰，酸橙，酸橙树，粘鸟胶，钙；vt.施石灰，涂上粘性物质，沾上粘鸟胶
example: 单词 lime 的例句||||Lime exists in many soils. 许多土壤中都含有石灰。||||He saw a lot of lime trees out of the door. 他在门外看到了很多酸橙树。

name: foil
interpret: n.箔，金属薄片，陪衬；vt.挫败，使受挫折
example: 单词 foil 的例句||||Milk bottle tops are made of tin foil. 牛奶瓶盖是用锡箔做的。||||An ugly woman serves as a foil to a pretty girl. 一个丑女人可以将美丽的姑娘反衬得更加漂亮。

name: stalk
interpret: n.茎，追踪，高视阔步；v.悄悄靠近，蔓延，高视阔步
example: 单词 stalk 的例句||||It's no better than a hollow stalk. 那比根空麦秆子好不了多少。||||It was not a stalk, it was an ambush. 这不是暗暗跟踪而是伏袭。

name: blunt
interpret: adj.（刀子）钝的，不锋利的，迟钝的，直率的
example: 单词 blunt 的例句||||The axe is too blunt to cut down the tree. 斧头太钝，砍不倒树。||||She is rather blunt in speech. 她说话很直率。

name: puppy
interpret: n.小狗，幼犬
example: 单词 puppy 的例句||||You must school your puppy to obey you. 你要训练你的小狗服从你。||||Their lively puppy frisks all over the house. 他们的小狗在屋里到处欢快地蹦跳。

name: moustache
interpret: n.髭；小胡子；八字胡；触须
example: 单词 moustache 的例句||||His father shaved off his moustache. 他的父亲剃掉了小胡子。||||Gary has a moustache on his upper lip. 加里上嘴唇有一撮小胡子。

name: squirrel
interpret: n.松鼠，松鼠的毛皮；vt.贮藏以备用
example: 单词 squirrel 的例句||||The squirrel makes a store of nuts for the winter. 松鼠贮藏坚果以备过冬。||||A squirrel hoards nuts for the winter. 松鼠为过冬贮藏坚果。

name: rectangle
interpret: n.长方形，矩形
example: 单词 rectangle 的例句||||Suppose the width of a rectangle is x metres. 设长方形的宽是x米。||||He handed me a little rectangle of white paper. 他递给我一张小小的长方形白纸片。

name: underpass
interpret: n.地下通道，下层道路
example: 单词 underpass 的例句||||Please turn left through the underpass. 请穿过地下通道左拐。||||The local government authorized the construction of the underpass. 地方政府批准了兴建这个地下通道。

name: knit
interpret: vt.编织，密接，结合，皱眉；vi.编织，变得紧凑，愈合；n.编织
example: 单词 knit 的例句||||She could knit up a baby's coat in an afternoon. 她能在一个下午织好一件婴儿的衣服。||||Our letters enabled us to knit up our old friendship. 通信使我们恢复了旧日的友谊。

name: blond
interpret: adj.金发的；n.白肤碧眼金发的人
example: 单词 blond 的例句||||Her long blond hair spilled down over her shoulders. 她那淡黄色的长发披垂在双肩。||||This blond man delivers newspaper every morning. 这个白肤金发碧眼的男人每天早晨送报纸。

name: curly
interpret: adj.卷曲的，卷缩的
example: 单词 curly 的例句||||The little boy has curly hair. 这小男孩长着一头卷发。||||She is tall and dark with curly hair. 她高高的个子，黑皮肤，卷头发。

name: Mars
interpret: n.火星，战争
example: 单词 Mars 的例句||||As of now we don't know much about Mars. 目前我们对火星还知之甚少。||||He contended that there must be life on Mars. 他坚信火星上面一定有生物。

name: sly
interpret: adj.狡猾的，偷偷摸摸的
example: 单词 sly 的例句||||You can't trust him, he's a sly old fox. 你不能相信他，他是一只狡猾的老狐狸。||||I was ready to sly out the alley door. 我准备从那边小门溜出去。

name: bump
interpret: n. 肿块，隆起物；撞击 vi. 碰撞，撞击；颠簸而行 vt. 碰，撞；颠簸
example: 单词 bump 的例句||||I heard a bump in the next room. 我听到隔壁房间传来“砰”的一声。||||He got a bad bump on his forehead. 他碰得前额隆起一个大包。

name: lounge
interpret: n.休闲室，休息室，长沙发；v.闲荡，闲散地度过，混日子
example: 单词 lounge 的例句||||We had coffee in the lounge. 我们在客厅里喝咖啡。||||Don't lounge away your working hours. 不要消磨工作时间。

name: chimpanzee
interpret: n.黑猩猩
example:
单词 chimpanzee 的例句||||Look，there is a chimpanzee.看，那边有一只大猩猩。
||||The chimpanzee is thought to be our closest animal relative. 黑猩猩被认为和我们血统最相近的动物。

name: transformer
interpret: n.变形金刚，变压器
example: 单词 transformer 的例句||||Keep away from the transformer. 不要靠近那个变压器。||||The transformer is more expensive than the toy train. 变形金刚比玩具火车贵得多。

name: stool
interpret: n.凳子；粪便；根株；v.长出新枝，排便
example: 单词 stool 的例句||||The stool is steady enough. 这个凳子很稳。||||The boy was straining at stool. 那个男孩在用力大便。

name: dreadful
interpret: adj.糟透了的，极端的，可怕的，令人畏惧的
example: 单词 dreadful 的例句||||I cannot imagine what to do in this dreadful situation. 我不能想像在这么糟的情况下该怎么办。||||I must apologize for the dreadful mistake I made. 我为我所犯的严重错误深表歉意。

name: amusing
interpret: adj.有有趣的，好玩的
example: 单词 amusing 的例句||||The girl was amusing herself with a doll. 那女孩在玩洋娃娃自娱。||||He related some amusing stories in his childhood to his children. 他向孩子们述说了他少年时代的一些趣事。

name: queer
interpret: adj.奇怪的，异常的，不舒服的，眩晕的
example: 单词 queer 的例句||||I heard some queer footsteps. 我听到某种可疑的脚步声。||||She has been queer lately. 她最近身体不舒服。

name: aerial
interpret: adj.飞机（航空）的，空中的；n.天线
example: 单词 aerial 的例句||||An aerial photograph of the field shows clearly where the buildings were. 这一场地的空中照片清晰地显示出这些建筑物的位置。||||Aerial pollution is a problem that should be solved quickly. 空气污染是一个亟待解决的问题。

name: essence
interpret: n.本质，实质，精华，精粹
example: 单词 essence 的例句||||We must try to get to the essence of things. 我们必须想法抓住事物的本质。||||The two things are the same in outward form but different in essence. 这两件东西外表形式一样，但实质不同。

name: haunt
interpret: vt.常出没于，使苦恼，萦绕；n.常去的地方
example: 单词 haunt 的例句||||The area was a haunt of criminals. 这个地区是罪犯经常出没的地方。||||The college library is a favorite haunt. 大学图书馆是人们喜欢的地方。

name: fireplace
interpret: n.壁炉，炉灶
example: 单词 fireplace 的例句||||The fireplace smokes badly. 这壁炉冒烟太多。||||I think we should wall up the fireplace. 我想应该封住壁炉。

name: eclipse
interpret: vt.使黯然失色，使相形见绌，日食，月食
example: 单词 eclipse 的例句||||During the seventies, her acting career was in eclipse. 在七十年代，她的表演生涯黯然失色。||||There will be an eclipse of the moon next month. 下个月有月食。

name: verse
interpret: n.诗，韵文，诗行
example: 单词 verse 的例句||||He is good at verse. 他善于作诗。||||His book was in parts written in verse. 他的书有许多地方是用韵文写的。

name: suspicious
interpret: adj.可疑的，容易引起怀疑的，猜疑的，疑心的
example: 单词 suspicious 的例句||||A man was hanging about the house in a suspicious manner. 一个男人在房子周围可疑地荡来荡去。||||He's so suspicious he would distrust his own mother. 他这个人疑心太重, 连自己的母亲也不相信。

name: execution
interpret: n.死刑，实行，执行，履行，演奏，表演
example: 单词 execution 的例句||||The musician's execution was perfect, but he played without feeling. 演奏者的技巧完美，但他演奏得毫无感情。||||His original idea was good, but his execution of the scheme was disastrous. 他的设想很好, 但实行起来却糟糕透顶。

name: lobby
interpret: n.前厅，（剧院的）门廊
example: 单词 lobby 的例句||||As he walked through the lobby, he skirted a group of ladies. 他穿过门厅时，绕过了一群女士。||||The delegates entered the assembly hall by way of the lobby. 代表们通过大厅进入会场。

name: pirate
interpret: n.海盗，海盗船
example: 单词 pirate 的例句||||The pirate chief commanded that the prisoners should be shot. 海盗头子下令枪毙俘虏。||||The shore batteries fired at the pirate boat. 海岸炮兵向海盗船开火。

name: cloak
interpret: n.斗蓬，披风，掩饰，幌子；vt.掩盖，掩饰
example: 单词 cloak 的例句||||The snow covered up the fields with a white cloak. 积雪给田野盖上了一件白色的外衣。||||She threw a heavy woollen cloak over her shoulders. 她把一件厚重的羊毛斗篷披在肩上。

name: magician
interpret: n.魔术师，变戏法的人，术士
example: 单词 magician 的例句||||With a wave of his hand, the magician made the rabbit vanish. 魔术师手一挥兔子便不见了。||||The magician transformed the man into a rabbit. 魔术师把那个人变成了兔子。

name: obedient
interpret: adj.服从的，顺从的
example: 单词 obedient 的例句||||She is an obedient woman. 她是位温顺的女人。||||We're absolutely obedient to the superior. 我们绝对服从上级。

name: biography
interpret: n.个人经历，传记
example: 单词 biography 的例句||||He is now collecting material for a biography of Tao Yuanming. 他正在为写陶渊明传记搜集材料。|||| Boswell wrote a famous biography of Dr. White. 鲍斯韦尔为怀特博士写过一本著名传记。

name: electrician
interpret: n.电工，电气技师
example:
单词 electrician 的例句||||He is an electrician. 他是一名电工技师。
||||We need an electrician to mend the iron. 我们要请电工修理熨斗。

name: scrub
interpret: n.用力擦洗，矮树，渺小之物；v.用力擦洗
example: 单词 scrub 的例句||||I got paint on my hands and it won't scrub off. 我手上沾上了油漆，擦不掉。||||The great plain was covered in scrub and small lifeless trees. 浩瀚的平原覆盖着灌木和毫无生气的矮小树林。

name: mustard
interpret: n.芥子，芥末，深黄色，强烈的兴趣，热情的人
example: 单词 mustard 的例句||||This meat should be seasoned with salt and mustard. 这肉里应该加点盐和芥末调味。||||This mustard is hot enough to bite your tongue. 这种芥末很辣，你的舌头会吃不消的。

name: idiot
interpret: n.白痴，傻子，笨蛋
example: 单词 idiot 的例句||||Only an idiot would make such a thoughtless remark. 只有草包才会说出这样没有头脑的话来。||||You are behaving like a perfect idiot. 你表现得像个十足的白痴。

name: blink
interpret: vi.眨眼睛，闪烁；vt.眨（眼睛），使闪烁
example: 单词 blink 的例句||||In a blink of an eye he had disappeared. 一眨眼的工夫他就没影了。||||The boy disappeared around the corner in a blink of an eye. 一眨眼，这男孩就在拐角处不见了。

name: burglar
interpret: n.窃贼，破门盗窃者
example: 单词 burglar 的例句||||The policeman took the burglar by surprise as he opened the window. 当夜盗开窗时，警察冷不防地捉住了他。||||The man glanced the burglar climbing out of the window. 那人瞥见小偷从窗户爬出来。

name: enterprise
interpret: n.企业单位，商业公司，事业，计划
example: 单词 enterprise 的例句||||They are determined to carry forward the enterprise. 他们决心把事业进行下去。|||| The enterprise has excellent prospects. 这家企业的远景极其美好。

name: hatch
interpret: n.孵化，舱口；vt.孵，孵出，策划；vi. 孵化
example: 单词 hatch 的例句||||No one knows how the new plan will hatch out. 谁也不知道这新方案将怎样制订出来。|||| The bird mistook the pebble for egg and tried to hatch it. 这只鸟错把卵石当蛋，想去孵它。

name: oval
interpret: n. 椭圆，椭圆形跑道；adj. 卵形的，椭圆形的
example: 单词 oval 的例句||||She has a lovely oval face. 她长着一张可爱的椭圆脸。|||| The shape of the earth is an oval. 地球的形状是个椭圆形。

name: overturn
interpret: vt. 推翻；倾覆；破坏 vi. 推翻；倾覆 n. 倾覆；周转；破灭
example: 单词 overturn 的例句||||Some high-ranking officers plotted to overturn the government. 有几名高级军官策划推翻政府。|||| We saw the canoe overturn, throwing its passengers into the water. 我们看到独木舟倾覆了，把上面的乘客掀入水中。

name: plump
interpret: adj.丰满的，丰富的，直接的；vi.下降，支持，变丰满；vt.突然放下，支持，使丰满；n.突然膨胀，坠落；adv.骤降，直线下降，不加限制的
example: 单词 plump 的例句||||The baby is plump and very cute. 那个婴儿白白胖胖的，十分可爱。||||The grains are quite plump. 谷粒儿很饱。

name: ritual
interpret: adj.例行的，老规矩的，惯常的
example: 单词 ritual 的例句||||This was the monthly ritual. 这是每月一次的例规。||||I realized that here the conventions required me to make the ritual noises. 我意识到此时按照惯例我应该说些客套话。

name: allowance
interpret: n.津贴，补贴，零用钱
example: 单词 allowance 的例句||||My monthly allowance is 50 yuan. 我每月的津贴是50元。||||I have to work to earn my allowance. 我非得工作挣零用钱。

name: ambitious
interpret: adj.有雄心的，劲头十足的，有野心的
example: 单词 ambitious 的例句||||One may be poor but never ceases to be ambitious. 人穷志不穷。||||He is an ambitious young man full of enthusiasm and vitality. 他是个充满热情与活力的有远大抱负的青年。

name: erosion
interpret: n.腐蚀，侵蚀，磨损，削弱，减少
example: 单词 erosion 的例句||||The erosion of beach here is serious. 这里海岸的腐蚀很严重。||||Drought and soil erosion had long been a major problem. 干旱和水土流失一直是个老大难问题。

name: massive
interpret: adj.巨大的，大规模的，大量的，大范围的
example: 单词 massive 的例句||||A massive sea search has failed to find any survivors. 经过大规模的海上搜救仍未找到幸存者。||||He drank a massive amount of alcohol. 他喝了大量的烈酒。

name: reside
interpret: vi.居住，定居（in），（性质等）存在，在于
example: 单词 reside 的例句||||They reside abroad. 他们居住在国外。||||The true face of Lushan is lost to my sight, for it is right in this mountain that I reside. 不识庐山真面目，只缘身在此山中。

name: stereo
interpret: adj.有立体视觉的，立体声的；n.固定形象，立体声
example: 单词 stereo 的例句||||She had the stereo on at full blast. 她把立体声音响开到了最大音量。||||This program is being broadcast in stereo. 这个节目正用立体声播放。

name: knob
interpret: n.球形把手，球形柄，旋钮，小块
example: 单词 knob 的例句||||There is a knob of butter on the table. 桌子上有一小块黄油。||||This knob is only held on by sellotape. 这个旋钮只是用透明胶带固定住的。

name: reel
interpret: n.卷筒，线轴；vi.蹒跚地走，旋转，骚乱，退缩，摇晃；vt.卷，卷...于轴上；旋转
example: 单词 reel 的例句||||He cast the line and then reel it back. 他把线抛出，然后把线绕回。||||The child could reel off many poems of the Tang Dynasty at the age of five. 这孩子五岁时就能把许多唐诗倒背如流。

name: lace
interpret: n.饰带，花边，缎带；v.结带子，饰以花边
example: 单词 lace 的例句||||She let a piece of lace into her dress. 她在衣服上镶了一块花边。||||The bride is wearing a wedding dress made of lace. 新娘穿一件蕾丝婚纱。

name: bud
interpret: vi.发芽，萌芽；n.芽，花蕾
example: 单词 bud 的例句||||Some flowers bud their leaves very early in spring. 有些花在春季里很早发出叶来。||||A bad habit in a child should be nipped in the bud. 应该尽早把孩子的坏习惯改过来。

name: veil
interpret: n.面纱，掩饰物，修女；vt.给...戴面纱或面罩；vi.带面纱或面罩
example: 单词 veil 的例句||||Please veil your face. 请用面纱遮住脸。||||There was a veil of mist over the mountains. 山上覆盖着一层薄雾。

name: tow
interpret: n.拖，拉，牵引
example: 单词 tow 的例句||||The broken-down car was taken in tow by a lorry. 那辆坏了的车由一辆货车拖着。||||Mrs Hayes went to the supermarket with her four little children in tow. 海斯太太带着她的4个小孩到超市去了。

name: badge
interpret: n.徽章，证章，标记，标识，象征
example: 单词 badge 的例句||||Every student should carry a school badge. 每个学生都应该佩带校徽。||||The olive leaf is a badge of peace. 橄榄叶是和平的象征。

name: heave
interpret: vt.（用力地）举起，抛
example: 单词 heave 的例句||||We heave him onto the platform. 我们把他抬起送到站台上。||||Heave the box onto the top shelf. 把这个箱子举到最上面一层搁板上。

name: documentary
interpret: adj.文献的；n.纪录片
example: 单词 documentary 的例句||||This case lacked documentary proof. 本案缺少书面证据。||||I watched a documentary on the Civil War. 我看了一部关于内战的纪录片。

name: dove
interpret: n.鸽，温和派人物，“鸽派”人物
example: 单词 dove 的例句||||A dove is often used as a symbol of peace. 鸽常作为和平的象征。||||Paul seemed more impressed by the dove. 保尔似乎对鸽子更感兴趣。

name: underwear
interpret: n.衫衣，内衣，贴身衣
example: 单词 underwear 的例句||||He had removed his underwear. 他已脱去了内衣。||||They left off their woollen underwear when the weather got warm. 天气转暖的时候，他们不再穿羊毛内衣。

name: yell
interpret: vi./n.号叫，叫喊
example: 单词 yell 的例句||||This gave them a chance to yell. 这给了他们大声喊叫的机会。||||When his schoolmate made the last goal, the boy gave out with an untrammeled yell. 那个男孩在他的同学踢进最后一球时不禁纵声欢呼。

name: yacht
interpret: n.游艇，快艇
example: 单词 yacht 的例句||||He was responsible for the location of the missing yacht. 他负责查明失踪游艇的下落。|||| He planned to cross the Pacific by yacht. 他曾打算乘快艇横渡太平洋。

name: Jupiter
interpret: n.木星
example: 单词 Jupiter 的例句||||Jupiter is unlike the Earth in almost every way. 木星与地球几乎完全不同。||||The astronomers were taking an observation of Jupiter. 天文学家们正在观测木星。

name: wrinkle
interpret: n.皱纹；vi.（使）起皱纹，皱眉；vt.使起皱纹
example: 单词 wrinkle 的例句||||This pair of pants does not wrinkle. 这条裤子不会皱。||||Too much sunbathing will wrinkle your skin. 皮肤晒得过分就能起皱纹。

name: shopper
interpret: n.购物者，顾客
example: 单词 shopper 的例句||||Hong Kong is a shopper's paradise. 香港是购物者的天堂。||||She is one shopper who takes responsibility in bagging her own goods. 她是一名负责把食品装进袋子的顾客。

name: cardboard
interpret: n.硬纸板，卡纸板
example: 单词 cardboard 的例句||||She brought the shopping home in a cardboard box. 她将买的东西放在纸箱里带回家。||||There is a sheet of stiff cardboard in the drawer. 在那个抽屉里有块硬纸板。

name: unimportant
interpret: adj.不重要的，无意义的
example: 单词 unimportant 的例句||||Let's not quarrel about such unimportant matters. 我们不要为这些小事争吵了。||||Money seems unimportant when sets beside the joys of family life. 与天伦之乐相比，金钱显得微不足道。

name: incomplete
interpret: adj.不完全的，不完善的
example: 单词 incomplete 的例句||||The building was left incomplete. 那座楼没有完工就停下来了。||||His novel was incomplete when he died. 他死的时候他的小说没有写完。

name: fitness
interpret: n.适合，适当，健康，健身
example: 单词 fitness 的例句||||They're doing exercises to improve their fitness. 他们为增强体质而做体操。||||No one questions her fitness for the job. 没人怀疑她能胜任这项工作。

name: leaflet
interpret: n.传单，活页，广告
example: 单词 leaflet 的例句||||He picked up a leaflet about care of the teeth. 他拾起一张宣传保护牙齿的传单。||||This leaflet contains your operating instructions. 这份活页包含你应知道的操作说明。

name: stall
interpret: n.摊位，铺子，售货亭
example: 单词 stall 的例句||||She sells fruits at a market stall. 她在市场的货摊上卖水果。||||He has a stall that sells designer ripoffs. 他开了个铺子卖仿冒设计师品牌衣服。

name: abbreviation
interpret: n.（用词首字母组成的）缩写
example: 单词 abbreviation 的例句||||A.D.is the abbreviation for "advertisement". A.D.是advertisement的缩写。||||The postal abbreviation for Kansas is KS. 堪萨斯州的邮政缩写是KS。

name: charm
interpret: vt.使着迷，使陶醉；n.招人喜欢之处，魅力
example: 单词 charm 的例句||||With all imperfections the short play has a real charm. 尽管有不少缺欠，这出小戏仍颇具魅力。||||He could resist her charm no longer. 他再也抗拒不住她的魅力。

name: elegant
interpret: adj.优美的，文雅的，简练的，简结的
example: 单词 elegant 的例句||||She was an elegant and accomplished woman. 她是位优雅的才女。||||She has a life of elegant ease. 她过着风雅悠闲的生活。

name: suspension
interpret: n.悬挂，悬浮液，暂缓，未决，中止
example: 单词 suspension 的例句||||The local authorities decided to build a suspension bridge over the river. 地方当局决定在这条河上建一座吊桥。||||A four-day suspension was imposed on her. 她被勒令停职4天。

name: caution
interpret: n.小心，谨慎，警告；vt.告诫，警告
example: 单词 caution 的例句||||You should exercise extreme caution when driving in fog. 在雾中开车要极为小心。||||There is no need for such caution. 不必如此小心谨慎。

name: cellar
interpret: n.地窖，地下室，酒窖
example: 单词 cellar 的例句||||He took a bottle of wine from the cellar. 他从酒窖里拿出一瓶酒。||||The little girl hid away in the cellar. 小姑娘藏在地下室里。

name: decimal
interpret: adj.十进的，小数的，十进制的；n.小数
example: 单词 decimal 的例句||||He knows the decimal rules. 他懂得十进制的用法。|||| Britain converted to decimal currency on February 15th, 1971. 英国于1971年2月15日改用十进位币制。

name: comet
interpret: n.慧星
example: 单词 comet 的例句||||Recently they have discovered a comet. 最近他们发现了一颗彗星。||||Halley's Comet is going to come back in 2061. 哈雷彗星将于2061年回归。

name: embassy
interpret: n.大使馆，大使及其随员
example: 单词 embassy 的例句||||Large crowd demonstrated outside the British Embassy. 很多群众在英国大使馆外面示威。||||He's a U. S. diplomat assigned to the embassy in London. 他是美国驻伦敦大使馆的一名外交官。

name: indefinite
interpret: adj.不明确的，模糊的，不定的，无限的
example: 单词 indefinite 的例句||||The store will be closed for an indefinite period. 这家商店将无限期关闭。||||He gave me an indefinite answer. 他给了我一个含糊其辞的答复。

name: shorten
interpret: vt.弄短，缩小，减少
example: 单词 shorten 的例句||||Minor accidents can shorten the life of a car. 小事故会缩短汽车寿命。||||My dress is too long I must shorten it. 我的连衣裙太长了，我得把它截短些。

name: skeleton
interpret: n.骨骼，框架，骨干，梗概，提要
example: 单词 skeleton 的例句||||A long illness made a skeleton out of him. 长期的卧病使他骨瘦如柴。||||Her notes gave us just the bare skeleton of her theory. 她的笔记只给我们提供了她的理论的梗概。

name: smash
interpret: v.粉碎，打碎；n.轰动的演出，巨大的成功
example: 单词 smash 的例句||||We heard the smash of plates breaking in the kitchen. 我们听到厨房里盘子破碎的声音。||||The gifted author wrote one smash after another. 这个天才作家创作了一篇又一篇轰动一时的作品。

name: economics
interpret: n.经济学，经济情况
example: 单词 economics 的例句||||He is studying economics, which subject is very important. 他正在学习经济学，该学科是很重要的。||||One can't separate politics from economics. 不能把政治与经济割裂开来。

name: antique
interpret: adj.古时的，古代的；n.古物，古器，古玩
example: 单词 antique 的例句||||The Sunday antique market is a happy hunting ground for collectors. 周日的古董市场是收藏家的淘物乐园。||||I saw the vase in the window of an antique shop. 我在一家古玩店的橱窗里看见了这个花瓶。

name: currently
interpret: adv.通常地，普遍地，当前
example: 单词 currently 的例句||||Currently it is not possible to reconcile this conflicting evidence. 当前还未有可能去解释这一矛盾的例证。||||Our contracts are currently under review. 我们的合同正在复查。

name: hose
interpret: n.输水软管，长统袜；vt.浇园子，用管冲洗
example: 单词 hose 的例句||||Connect the hose to the tap and turn on the tap. 把水管接在龙头上，打开水龙头。||||After raining, I always hose the yard out. 雨后，我总是用软管把院子冲干净。

name: grin
interpret: n./vi.露齿而笑，咧嘴一笑
example: 单词 grin 的例句||||I know she is joking because she has a big grin on her face. 我知道她是在开玩笑。因为她满脸笑容。|||| She came out of his office with a big grin on her face. 她笑容满面地走出他的办公室。

name: nickname
interpret: n.绰号，昵称；v.给...取绰号，叫错名字
example: 单词 nickname 的例句||||She called me by my nickname. 她叫我的外号。|||| Why do you fasten such a nickname on her? 你为什么给她取这样一个绰号？

name: siren
interpret: n.汽笛，警报器，迷人的女人，妖妇
example: 单词 siren 的例句||||The cars had stopped at the sound of the approaching siren. 这些汽车听到愈来愈近的警笛声便停了下来。||||That woman is a real siren. 那女人真是条美女蛇. 。

name: thorough
interpret: adj. 彻底的，完全的，精心的
example: 单词 thorough 的例句||||He made a very thorough analysis on the situation. 他对形势的分析很透彻。|||| The committee reported its findings after a thorough investigation. 委员会在彻底调查以后报告了调查结果。

name: squash
interpret: n.壁球，摺皱不堪，拥挤嘈杂的人群，浓缩果汁，美国南瓜；vt.压扁，压制；vi.变扁，压榨
example: 单词 squash 的例句||||He is drinking lemon squash. 他正在喝柠檬露。|||| She sprained her ankle playing squash. 她在打软式墙网球时扭伤了脚踝。

name: fake
interpret: vt.伪造，造假，假装；n.假货，赝品
example: 单词 fake 的例句||||He can tell a fake from the original. 他能分辨出赝品和真品。||||You can easily fake up an excuse to avoid going out with him. 你可以很容易地编造一个借口而不与他一同外出。

name: terrific
interpret: adj.可怕的，极好的，非常的
example: 单词 terrific 的例句||||The game was terrific. 那场比赛棒极了。||||Darren drove at a terrific speed. 达伦以惊人的速度驾车。

name: cunning
interpret: adj.狡猾的，奸诈的；n.狡猾，奸诈
example: 单词 cunning 的例句||||A spy used cunning means to find out secrets. 间谍使用狡猾的手段获取机密。||||The fox is known for its cleverness and cunning. 狐狸的机敏和狡猾是人所共知的。

name: bull
interpret: n.公牛，买进证券投机图利者，看涨的人
example: 单词 bull 的例句||||It's only a hair off a bull's back to them. 这对他们来说，不过九牛一毛。||||Many dogs closed around the bull. 很多狗渐渐地把那只牛围了起来。

name: Arctic
interpret: adj.北极的；n.北极
example: 单词 Arctic 的例句||||They flew over the unlimited reaches of the Arctic. 他们飞过了茫茫无边的北极上空。||||The sort of animal lived in the Arctic Circle. 这种动物生活在北极圈里。

name: cereal
interpret: n.谷类，五谷，禾谷
example: 单词 cereal 的例句||||I have hot cereal every day for breakfast. 我每天早餐吃热麦片粥。||||Soybeans are handled differently from cereal grains. 大豆的加工处理与谷类的加工处理不同。

name: errand
interpret: n.差使（如送信，买东西等），（短程）差事
example: 单词 errand 的例句||||I've come on a special errand. 我是专程来办一件差事的。||||This is a formidable errand for me. 这对我来说是个太艰巨的任务。

name: gossip
interpret: n.流言蜚语，爱说长道短的人；vi.传播流言
example: 单词 gossip 的例句||||She broadcast the gossip all over the town. 她将这个流言传遍全镇。||||They spread a lot of tacky gossip about his love life. 关于他的爱情生活，他们散播了许多不堪的闲言闲语。

name: slot
interpret: n.（口）位置，职位，狭长孔，狭槽
example: 单词 slot 的例句||||Put a coin in the slot. 将硬币放入投币口。||||He's been given a regular ten-minute slot on the radio. 电台定期给他十分钟的节目广播时间。

name: plaster
interpret: n.石膏，灰泥，膏药；v.涂以灰泥，敷以膏药，使...平
example: 单词 plaster 的例句||||He mixed up some plaster to repair the wall. 他和了一些灰泥去补墙。||||She applied the plaster on his shoulder. 她将膏药贴在他的膀子上。

name: nasty
interpret: adj.令人讨厌的，困难的，恶劣的，下流的
example: 单词 nasty 的例句||||She got a nasty knock on the head when she fell. 她跌倒时头部受到严重碰撞。||||When this material burns, it flings off a nasty smell. 这种物质燃烧时发出一股难闻的气味。

name: pistol
interpret: n.手枪
example: 单词 pistol 的例句||||He drew his pistol and aimed at the enemy soldier. 他拔出枪对准敌兵。||||The escaped criminal fell at the sound of a pistol. 手枪一响，逃犯应声倒下。

name: tread
interpret: vi.踩；行走；vt.踩烂（出）；n.胎面，脚步声
example: 单词 tread 的例句||||A policeman walked by with a slow, measured tread. 一名警察迈着小心的步子慢慢走过。||||We heard father's tread on the steps. 我们听到台阶上父亲的脚步声。

name: unlock
interpret: v.启示，揭示，开...的锁
example: 单词 unlock 的例句||||The border police required the traveler to unlock his luggage. 边防警察要求旅客打开行李。||||We heard somebody unlock the door. 我们听见有人开门锁。

name: tramp
interpret: n.流浪者，步行，跋涉；v.步行，跋涉
example: 单词 tramp 的例句||||She wants to go for a tramp in the country. 她想去乡间远足。||||A tramp came to the door and asked for food. 一个流浪汉来到门前讨饭吃。

name: commentary
interpret: n.评论，评注；实况广播报导，现场口头评述
example: 单词 commentary 的例句||||He is giving the commentary on the basketball game. 他正在对篮球赛作评论。||||His running commentary on the football match was excellent. 他对这次足球赛所作的实况报道十分精彩。

name: gramophone
interpret: n.留声机，唱机
example: 单词 gramophone 的例句||||The telephone and the gramophone were contemporary. 电话和留声机是同一时代的产物。|||| Gramophone records warp in very hot weather. 天气太热时，唱片会弯翘。

name: declaration
interpret: n.宣布，宣告，宣言，声明（书），申报
example: 单词 declaration 的例句||||We read the declaration posted on the bulletin board. 我们读了贴在布告板上的声明。||||At the recent convention a declaration was adopted. 在最近举行的大会上通过了一项宣言。

name: gear
interpret: n.齿轮，传动装置，设备，衣服；vt.使适应
example: 单词 gear 的例句||||We have to gear our lives to the new changes. 我们必须使自己的生活适应新的变化。||||The teeth of the wheel gear into each other. 齿轮互相啮合。

name: cling
interpret: vi.缠住，粘住，依恋，依靠，坚信，坚持
example: 单词 cling 的例句||||Wet clothes cling to the body. 湿衣服贴身。|||| Members of a family should cling together in times of trouble. 一家人应该患难与共。

name: attendant
interpret: n.随从，跟班，出席者，服务员；adj.伴随的，出席的，注意的，在场的
example: 单词 attendant 的例句||||She was interrupted by the entrance of an attendant. 服务员进来，打断了她的话。||||We met the officer attendant of the general. 我们见到了随从将军的副官。

name: imaginative
interpret: adj.富有想象力的，爱想象的
example: 单词 imaginative 的例句||||The imaginative child made up fairy stories. 这个想像力丰富的孩子自己编神话故事。||||Scott was an imaginative writer. 司格特是位富于想象力的作家。

name: kidnap
interpret: vt.拐，绑架，劫持（某人）
example: 单词 kidnap 的例句||||A pair of robbers were trying to kidnap his wife. 两个强盗正试图绑架他的妻子。||||They were intelligent and educated, yet they chose to kidnap and kill. 他们聪明且有教养，却选择去绑架和杀人。

name: purity
interpret: n.纯净，纯洁，纯度
example: 单词 purity 的例句||||She was a woman of purity and goodness. 她是一位纯洁善良的妇女。||||The white colour is a symbol of purity. 白色是纯洁的象征。

name: stubborn
interpret: adj.难以移动，去除的，固执的，顽固的
example: 单词 stubborn 的例句||||I can not cope with that boy, he is stubborn. 我对付不了那个孩子，他很固执。||||When he's in his stubborn mood, he isn't easily talked round. 他那股牛劲上来了，一时不容易说服。

name: slang
interpret: n.俚语，行话；vt.使用俚语，辱骂；vi.辱骂
example: 单词 slang 的例句||||The phrase is labelled as slang in the dictionary. 这个短语在这本字典里被注为俚语。||||Slang often goes in and out of fashion quickly. 俚语往往很快风行起来又很快不再风行了。

name: directory
interpret: n.目录，工商名录，指南；n.目录
example: 单词 directory 的例句||||Her name is listed in the telephone directory. 她的名字被列在了电话号码簿上。||||You can check the directory near the elevator over there. 您可以到电梯旁的指南上查找。

name: pamphlet
interpret: n.小册子
example: 单词 pamphlet 的例句||||Over a thousand copies of the pamphlet have now been given out. 现在已分发了一千多本小册子。||||The scholarly monographs were published as pamphlet. 学术专著是以小册子形式出版的。

name: pedestrian
interpret: n.步行者，行人；adj.徒步的，平淡无奇的，一般的
example: 单词 pedestrian 的例句||||The criminal pushed a pedestrian down and ran away. 罪犯推倒了一个行人逃跑了。||||The city built a pedestrian overpass over the highway. 城里在公路上建了一座过街天桥。

name: reef
interpret: n.礁，礁石，暗礁
example: 单词 reef 的例句||||The ship and its crew were lost on the reef. 那条船及船员都触礁遇难了。||||The ship was wrecked on a coral reef. 这条船在珊瑚暗礁上撞毁了。

name: reference
interpret: n.提到，说到，暗示，查看，查阅
example: 单词 reference 的例句||||We spent days going through all related reference material. 我们花了好多天功夫查阅所有有关的参考资料。||||I like to have my reference books within my reach. 我喜欢把参考书放到伸手可取的地方。

name: thoughtless
interpret: adj.没有考虑的，无深虑的，轻率的
example: 单词 thoughtless 的例句||||It was thoughtless of you to forget your sister's birthday. 你真粗心，把你姐姐的生日都给忘了。||||I wonder why you are so thoughtless of others. 我很奇怪，你为何如此不替别人着想。

name: tightly
interpret: adv.紧紧地，坚固地，牢固地
example: 单词 tightly 的例句||||My child holds onto my hand tightly while we cross the street. 横穿马路时，孩子紧拉着我的手不放。||||The crowd pressed together so tightly that we could hardly breathe. 人群挤在一起，我们几乎喘不过气来。

name: staircase
interpret: n.楼梯，楼梯间
example: 单词 staircase 的例句||||Footsteps on the staircase interrupted his train of thought. 楼梯上传来脚步声，打断了他的思路。||||I crossed the staircase landing, and entered the room she indicated. 我经过一个楼梯平台，走进她说的那个房间。

name: paradise
interpret: n.伊甸乐园，天堂
example: 单词 paradise 的例句||||My house had a small backyard, the paradise of children. 我那幢房子有一个小后院，那是孩子们玩耍的乐园。||||On a hot day a dip in the sea is sheer paradise. 热天洗个海水澡是十分令人惬意的事。

name: beware
interpret: vt./vi.谨防，当心
example: 单词 beware 的例句||||Beware of the fire. 留心火烛。||||Beware of being too impatient with others. 注意不要对他人太没有耐心。

name: cruise
interpret: v.巡航，航游，缓慢巡行；n.海上航游
example: 单词 cruise 的例句||||They went on a cruise to Tenerife. 他们乘船去特纳利夫岛。||||She wants to cruise the canals of France in a barge. 她想乘驳船游览法国的运河。

name: mercury
interpret: n.汞，水银，水银柱
example: 单词 mercury 的例句||||The liquid we can see in thermometers is mercury. 我们看到的温度计里的液体是水银。||||Mercury has a much greater density than water. 水银的密度比水大得多。

name: municipal
interpret: adj.市的，市政的；n.政府证券
example: 单词 municipal 的例句||||The municipal authorities have kept the roads up well. 市政当局把道路保养得不错。||||The city is planning to build a municipal library. 该市正计划建一座市立图书馆。

name: oriental
interpret: adj.东方的，东方人的，东方文化的
example: 单词 oriental 的例句||||China is an oriental country with a long history. 中国是一个有着悠久历史的东方国家。||||They maintain a very powerful fleet in Oriental waters. 他们在远东海域保持着一支非常强大的舰队。

name: pearl
interpret: n.珍珠，珍珠母
example: 单词 pearl 的例句||||He bought his girlfriend a pearl necklace. 他给他女朋友买了一条珍珠项链。||||The crane and the mussel fight to death. 鹬蚌相争。

name: brightness
interpret: n.明亮，亮度，聪颖，光泽度，灯火通明
example: 单词 brightness 的例句||||The brightness of the paint has worn off a little. 油漆的光泽有些磨损了。||||Her eyes squinted against the brightness. 亮光刺得她眯起眼睛。

name: roam
interpret: vi.漫游，闲逛，徜徉
example: 单词 roam 的例句||||He used to roam the streets for hours on end. 他过去常逛大街，一逛就是几个小时。||||I like to roam about over the countryside. 我喜欢在乡间走一走。

name: relay
interpret: n.接力赛，中继转播（设备）；vt.转述，转播
example: 单词 relay 的例句||||They will relay your message. 他们会转达你的口信。||||This metal tower is used to relay television signals to distant villages. 这个金属塔是用于向遥远的村子转播电视讯号的。

name: psychologist
interpret: n.心理学家；心理学研究者
example: 单词 psychologist 的例句||||Dr.Sinclair is a child psychologist. 辛克莱博士是一位儿童心理学专家。||||Psychologist is expert who studies at psychology. 心理学家是研究心理学的专家。

name: grab
interpret: vt./n.攫取，抓取；vi.攫取，抓住(at)
example: 单词 grab 的例句||||It is rude to grab a seat. 抢占座位是不礼貌的。|||| The thief made a grab at my bag but I pushed him away. 贼想抢我的手提包，但被我推开了。

name: liberation
interpret: n.解放，解放运动（为获得平等权利和地位的行为）
example: 单词 liberation 的例句||||We should help those who are still struggling for liberation. 我们应当帮助那些仍在为独立而斗争的人们。||||Many people died during famines every year before liberation. 解放前每年有许多人在饥荒中死亡。

name: fragile
interpret: adj.易碎的，脆的，易损坏的，虚弱的，脆弱的
example: 单词 fragile 的例句||||The old lady was increasingly fragile after her operation. 那位老太太手术后身体越来越虚弱。||||This glass disc looks very fragile. 这个玻璃盘子看起来很容易碎。

name: supervise
interpret: vt. 监督，管理；指导 vi. 监督，管理；指导
example: 单词 supervise 的例句||||We must supervise and speed up the fulfilment of assigned tasks. 已经布置了的工作，应当认真督促检查。||||Tomorrow he will supervise all the pupils taking the English examination. 明天全体学生考英语，将担任监考。

name: couch
interpret: n.睡椅，长沙发椅；vt.表达，隐含
example: 单词 couch 的例句||||Lie down on the couch if you're feeling ill. 如果你感觉不舒服就躺到沙发上去。||||The rabbit sprang from its grassy couch. 兔子从草丛中跳出。

name: cop
interpret: n.警察；vt.抓住
example: 单词 cop 的例句||||The cop told him to button his lips. 警察叫他闭嘴。||||The robber was overpowered by the cop. 抢劫犯被警察制伏。

name: cuckoo
interpret: n.布谷鸟，杜鹃
example: 单词 cuckoo 的例句||||The cuckoo lays its eggs in other birds' nests. 杜鹃在别的鸟巢中产卵。||||The cuckoo is a harbinger of spring. 布谷鸟预告春天的来临。

name: automatically
interpret: adv.不加思索地，无意识地，自动地
example: 单词 automatically 的例句||||The machine cycles automatically. 这台机器自动循环运转。||||She had automatically labelled the boys as troublemakers. 她不假思索地认定这些男孩子是捣蛋鬼。

name: timid
interpret: adj.胆怯的，害羞的
example: 单词 timid 的例句||||The rabbit is timid and suspicious. 兔子胆小而多疑。||||He was timid about investing money. 他不敢投资。

name: whirl
interpret: n. 旋转，回旋；昏乱；一连串的事；短暂的旅行 vi. 旋转，回旋；急走；头晕眼花 vt. 使旋转；卷走，飞快地带走
example: 单词 whirl 的例句||||The dancer suddenly made a whirl. 那位舞蹈演员突然做了一个旋转动作。||||My thoughts were in a whirl. 我的思想一片混乱。

name: spectator
interpret: n.观众，目击者，旁观者
example: 单词 spectator 的例句||||A spectator threw the ball back to the players. 一个观众把球掷回给球员。||||He was content to stand by as an impassive spectator. 他满足于站在旁边做一个冷漠的旁观者。

name: vocational
interpret: adj.职业的，业务的
example: 单词 vocational 的例句||||They have set a regular time for vocational study. 他们把业务学习时间固定下来。||||She was given some quick training at the vocational school. 她在职业学校受过速成训练。

name: porch
interpret: n.门廊，入口处，走廊，游廊
example: 单词 porch 的例句||||There are thousands of pages of advertising on our porch. 有成千上万页广告堆在我们的门廊上。||||The porch is supported by six immense pillars. 门廊由六根大柱子支撑着。

name: blacksmith
interpret: n.铁匠，锻工
example: 单词 blacksmith 的例句||||The blacksmith is hammering the red-hot metal. 铁匠正在锤烧红的铁。||||The blacksmith forged a bar of iron into a hook. 铁匠把一根铁条锻造成一个钩子。

name: olive
interpret: n.橄榄，橄榄树，橄榄色；adj.黄绿色的，黄褐色的，橄榄色的
example: 单词 olive 的例句||||Have you eaten a kind of fruit called olive? 你吃过橄榄这种水果吗？ ||||She likes olive because it symbolizes peace. 她喜欢橄榄色因为它象征着和平。

name: clip
interpret: n.夹子，别针，弹夹，片断；vt.夹住，修剪
example: 单词 clip 的例句||||May I clip out the report on my performance? 我能把报道我的文章剪下来吗？||||She fastened the papers together with a paper clip. 她用曲别针把文件别在一起。

name: stray
interpret: n.走失的家畜，浪子；adj.迷途的，偶然的；vi.迷路，彷徨
example: 单词 stray 的例句||||We couldn't identify the stray child. 我们不能辨认出这个迷途孩子的身份。||||Please don't stray from the subject. 请不要离开本题。

name: grief
interpret: n.悲伤，悲痛，悲伤的事，悲痛的缘由
example: 单词 grief 的例句||||Don't allow yourself to sink into grief, it can do no good. 不要使自己陷入悲哀之中，这样一点好处也没有。||||After her mother died, she abandoned herself to grief. 母亲死后，她沉浸于悲痛之中。

name: triple
interpret: n.三倍之数，三个一组；adj.三倍的
example: 单词 triple 的例句||||Twelve is the triple of four. 十二是四的三倍数。|||| He received triple wages for all his extra work. 由于额外的工作他领取了三倍的工资。

name: popularity
interpret: n.普及，流行，名望，受欢迎
example: 单词 popularity 的例句||||The story had an extensive popularity among American readers. 这本小说在美国读者中赢得广泛的声望。||||Our product enjoys popularity throughout the world. 我们的产品饮誉全球。

name: symphony
interpret: n.交响乐（曲），（色彩等的）和谐
example: 单词 symphony 的例句||||The Ninth Symphony of Beethoven is a famous one. 贝多芬的第九交响乐非常有名。||||They play over the whole symphony. 他们把整个交响乐重新演奏了一遍。

name: exotic
interpret: adj.奇异的，异乎寻常的，外（国）来的，外国产
example: 单词 exotic 的例句||||There are some exotic words in English language. 英语中有一些外来词。||||She likes to wear exotic clothes. 她喜欢穿奇装异服。

name: historic
interpret: adj.历史上著名的，具有历史意义的
example: 单词 historic 的例句||||This is a historic occasion. 这是具有重大历史意义的时刻。||||We are living in a great historic era. 我们正处在一个伟大的历史时代。

name: compliment
interpret: n.[pl.]问候，致意；n./v. 称赞，恭维
example: 单词 compliment 的例句||||The manager paid her a compliment on her work. 经理赞扬了她的工作。||||Your presence is a great compliment. 承蒙光临，不胜荣幸。

name: feminine
interpret: adj.女性的，女子气的
example: 单词 feminine 的例句||||He has a very feminine voice. 他的声音非常像女人。|||| She was a very feminine person. 她是个很有女性气质的人。

name: acceptable
interpret: adj.可接受的，合意的，受欢迎的
example: 单词 acceptable 的例句||||The terms of the contract are acceptable to us. 我们认为这个合同的条件可以接受。||||Air pollution in the city had reached four times the acceptable levels. 这座城市的空气污染程度曾高达可接受标准的四倍。

name: swamp
interpret: n.沼泽，湿地；v.淹没，陷于沼泽
example: 单词 swamp 的例句||||The swamp teems with mosquitoes. 这片沼泽地蚊子多极了。||||The water in the swamp is foul. 沼泽中的水很臭。

name: vegetation
interpret: n.植物，草木，（植物）生长
example: 单词 vegetation 的例句||||As we drove towards the desert, the vegetation became sparse. 我们驱车前往沙漠，沿途的草木渐渐变得稀疏。||||The earth bore a thick green mantle of vegetation. 大地覆盖着一层厚厚的绿色植物。

name: historian
interpret: n.历史学家，编史家
example: 单词 historian 的例句||||As a historian, he was most typical of the times in which he lived. 作为历史学家，他是他所处时代最有代表性的人物。||||He calls himself a historian, but his books are a mere journalism. 他自称为历史学家，但是他的书都是些肤浅的通俗作品。

name: tile
interpret: n.砖瓦；vt.铺以瓦，铺以瓷砖
example: 单词 tile 的例句||||The bathroom is faced with tile. 浴室铺着瓷砖。||||I pointed to a number of scratches in the tile floor. 我指向地板砖上的一道道划痕。

name: inspiration
interpret: n.灵感，鼓励者，吸气
example: 单词 inspiration 的例句||||These events provided the inspiration for his first novel. 这些事件给了他创作第一部小说的灵感。|||| What an inspiration she was to all around her? 她对于她周围所有的人是一种多么大的鼓舞？

name: bracket
interpret: n.托架，括号，等级；vt.套以括号，放在一起
example: 单词 bracket 的例句||||The bracket came loose. 托架松了。||||Don't bracket me with him just because we work for the same company. 别因为我和他在一家公司工作而把我们相提并论。

name: comprehend
interpret: vt.了解，理解，领会
example: 单词 comprehend 的例句||||I did not comprehend his meaning. 我不理解他的意思。||||If you can use a word correctly and effectively, you comprehend it. 你如果能正确和有效地使用一个字，你就了解它了。

name: accessory
interpret: n.附件，附属品，（为全套衣服增加美感的）服饰
example: 单词 accessory 的例句||||He is an accessory to the murderer. 他是这个杀人凶手的同谋。||||A radio is an accessory to a car. 收音机是汽车的附件。

name: equator
interpret: n.赤道，（平分球形物体的面的）圆
example: 单词 equator 的例句||||Singapore is near the equator. 新加坡位于赤道附近。|||| The United States is north of the equator. 美国位于赤道以北。

name: rating
interpret: n.级别，等级，额定值，责骂，收视率
example: 单词 rating 的例句||||It is a ship with a rating of 500, 000 tons. 这是一艘五十万吨级的船。||||The opinion polls gave the president a high rating. 民意测验显示人民对总统的支持率很高。

name: context
interpret: n.背景，环境，上下文，语境
example: 单词 context 的例句||||You can always tell the meaning of a word from its context. 你常可以从上下文中猜出词义来。||||This sentence does not seem to connect with the context. 这个句子似乎与上下文脱节。

name: crisis
interpret: n.危机，危急关头，决定性时刻，关键阶段
example: 单词 crisis 的例句||||He had proved that he could be relied on in a crisis. 他已表明，在紧要关头他是可以信赖的。||||The topic today centers about the crisis in the Middle East. 今天课题的中心是中东危机。

name: curriculum
interpret: n.课程，（学校等的）全部课程
example: 单词 curriculum 的例句||||Is German on your school's curriculum? 你们学校有德语课吗？ ||||The English curriculum should stress both composition and reading. 英语课程对作文和阅读应同样重视。

name: deposit
interpret: n.定金，存款，矿藏；vt.使沉淀，寄存，储蓄
example: 单词 deposit 的例句||||There is too much deposit in a bottle of wine. 酒瓶里有太多的沉淀物。||||The hotel requires a deposit for all advance bookings. 旅馆规定凡预订房间都要先付订金。

name: domestic
interpret: adj.家里的，国内的，本国的；n.家仆，佣人
example: 单词 domestic 的例句||||This is domestic news. 这是国内新闻。||||She does the domestic affairs every day. 她每天都忙家务。

name: entitle
interpret: v.给以权利（或资格），给以...称号，给...题名
example: 单词 entitle 的例句||||How does one entitle the queen when speaking directly to her? 直接同女王讲话时，我们该怎样称呼她呢？ ||||This ticket doesn't entitle you to travel first class. 你这张票不能坐头等位。

name: interpret
interpret: vt.解释，说明，理解；vi.作口译
example: 单词 interpret 的例句||||We have to interpret his words in a modern light. 我们不得不用现代观点来解释他的话。||||Please interpret the comments of our foreign guest. 请把外宾的话翻译一下。

name: literary
interpret: adj.文学（上）的
example: 单词 literary 的例句||||Literary works of this kind are well received by the masses. 这样的文学作品很受群众欢迎。||||The book was favourably noticed in literary magazines. 这本书在文学杂志上得到好评。

name: membership
interpret: n.成员资格，会员全体，从属关系
example: 单词 membership 的例句||||I must renew my membership of the sailing club. 我必须延续我的航海俱乐部会员的资格。||||He made up his mind to apply for membership in the Party. 他决心申请入党。

name: penalty
interpret: n.处罚，刑罚，罚款
example: 单词 penalty 的例句||||If you knock the ball with your hand in football, you will suffer a penalty. 如果在踢足球时你用手碰到球，你将受到处罚。||||One of those arrested could face the death penalty. 被捕的那些人中有一人可能被判死刑。

name: overlook
interpret: vt.忽视，忽略，俯瞰，眺望，宽容，宽恕
example: 单词 overlook 的例句||||How could you overlook paying the rent? 你怎么会忘了付房租？||||It was a slight overlook on my part. 这是我的一个小疏忽。

name: portable
interpret: adj.轻便的，手提式的；n.便携的东西
example: 单词 portable 的例句||||I have a portable typewriter. 我有一个便携式打字机。||||There is a pretty portable pair of steps in one corner of the room. 屋角放着一架小巧玲珑的折梯。

name: priority
interpret: n.优先处理的事，居先，优先（权）
example: 单词 priority 的例句||||The development of the national economy is a top priority. 发展国民经济是应予以最优先考虑的事。||||Things should be taken up in order of priority. 办事应有个先后次序。

name: selection
interpret: n.选择，挑选，精选品，可选择的东西
example: 单词 selection 的例句||||We left the selection of the team to the captain. 我们把挑选队员的工作交给了队长。||||The shop has a fine selection of cheeses. 那家商店有各种精美乳酪可供选购。

name: statistics
interpret: n.统计，统计数字，统计学
example: 单词 statistics 的例句||||We have statistics for the last year. 我们有去年的统计资料。||||Statistics is taught in many colleges. 许多大学都教授统计学。

name: tribe
interpret: n.部落，种族，一伙人
example: 单词 tribe 的例句||||This is a subject tribe. 这是个受他人统治的部落。|||| Many of the tribe's customs and rituals are as old as the hills. 这部落的许多风俗、仪式都极其古老。

name: transplant
interpret: n.移植的器官或植物；v.使迁移，使移居
example: 单词 transplant 的例句||||Some plants do not transplant well. 有些植物不宜移植。||||Several of the patients had received kidney transplant. 病人中有几位已接受了肾移植手术。

name: confusion
interpret: n.困惑，迷乱，混淆，混乱，骚乱
example: 单词 confusion 的例句||||His answers to my questions have only added to my confusion. 他对我的问题的回答只是使我更加困惑不解。|||| His unexpected arrival threw us into total confusion. 他的突然来访使我们完全不知所措。

name: suicide
interpret: n.自杀，自毁，自杀性行为
example: 单词 suicide 的例句||||The number of suicide has increased. 自杀案件的数量增加了。||||The death was adjudged a suicide by sleeping pills. 该死亡事件被判定为服用安眠药自杀。

name: bankrupt
interpret: n.破产者；adj.破产的；vt.使...破产
example: 单词 bankrupt 的例句||||That factory has gone bankrupt. 那家工厂倒了。||||The enemy's scheme went bankrupt. 敌人的计谋破产了。

name: terrorist
interpret: n.恐怖主义者，恐怖分子
example: 单词 terrorist 的例句||||Without the gun, I'm a sitting duck for any terrorist. 没有这支枪，我就成了恐怖分子下手的目标了。||||The district was put on red alert during a terrorist's bomb scare. 这个地区在得到恐怖分子炸弹恐吓后作了应急准备。

name: oak
interpret: n.栎树，橡树，栎木，橡木
example: 单词 oak 的例句||||The chair is of solid oak. 这把椅子是纯橡木的。|||| The carpenter will floor this room with oak. 木匠将用橡木铺设这个房间的地板。

name: peacock
interpret: n.（雄）孔雀，爱炫耀的人；v.炫耀
example: 单词 peacock 的例句||||The peacock spreads its splendid tail. 孔雀展开了它那灿烂夺目的尾巴。||||She is as proud as a peacock. 她十分骄傲。

name: arch
interpret: n.拱门，桥洞；v.拱起，成为弓形
example: 单词 arch 的例句||||Dip your head under the low arch. 在低矮的门拱下要低头。||||The trees arch overhead. 树木在头顶上弯成拱形。

name: prestige
interpret: n.声望，威望，威信
example: 单词 prestige 的例句||||Their products enjoy ever higher prestige in the world market. 他们的产品在世界市场上享有越来越高的声誉。||||He has high prestige among the masses. 他在群众中威信很高。

name: imperial
interpret: adj.帝王的，至尊的；n.特等品
example: 单词 imperial 的例句||||They made an objection to the imperial system with resolution. 他们坚决反对帝制。||||The Prince Imperial passed away last night. 皇太子昨晚去世了。

name: plateau
interpret: n.高原，平稳，稳定状态；vi.到达平稳阶段
example: 单词 plateau 的例句||||The ranch is in the middle of a large plateau. 该牧场位于一个辽阔高原的中部。||||As the river drops from the plateau, it forms great waterfalls. 河水从高原上下落时，形成了巨大的瀑布。

name: romance
interpret: n.恋爱关系，浪漫气氛，爱情小说，传奇
example: 单词 romance 的例句||||She wrote a romance about an artist's life in Tokyo. 她写了一个关于一位艺术家在东京生活的浪漫故事。||||They tried to rekindle the flames of romance. 他们试图重燃爱火。

name: chorus
interpret: n.合唱，合唱队，齐声
example: 单词 chorus 的例句||||Never before have I heard this song sung in chorus. 我从来没有听过这首歌的合唱。||||The children repeated the words after her in chorus. 孩子们跟她齐声朗读单词。

name: rap
interpret: n.轻敲，拍击，责骂，厉声说出，说唱音乐，谈话，最少量；vi.轻敲，敲门，表演说唱音乐，畅谈；vt.抓，抢，拍击
example: 单词 rap 的例句||||I heard a rap on the door. 我听到有轻轻的敲门声。||||Today we are going to rap about relationships. 今天我们要聊聊关系的问题。

name: blossom
interpret: n.花，开花；vi.开花，发展
example: 单词 blossom 的例句||||The blossom on the trees looks lovely in springtime. 春天树上的花很漂亮。||||Let a hundred flowers blossom, let a hundred schools of thought contend. 百花齐放，百家争鸣。

name: valve
interpret: n.阀，阀门，电子管
example: 单词 valve 的例句||||The exhaust valve on my car has burnt out. 我汽车上的排气阀烧掉了。||||The connecting rod may drive a valve stem directly. 连杆可以直接带动阀门的把柄。

name: Dean
interpret: n.(大学)院长，系主任，教务长
example: 单词 Dean 的例句||||The students much like the new dean. 学生们很喜欢这位新系主任。||||Who is the dean of the Foreign Languages Department? 外语系主任是谁？

name: stitch
interpret: n.一针，疼痛，碎布条；v.缝合
example: 单词 stitch 的例句||||He had a stitch in the side. 他胁部疼痛。||||Fold the fabric and stitch the two layers together. 将布料对折，然后将两层缝在一起。

name: extinct
interpret: adj.灭绝的，不再活跃的，熄灭了的，已废弃的
example: 单词 extinct 的例句||||All hopes were extinct. 所有希望都破灭了。|||| Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years. 恐龙绝种已有几百万年了。

name: mount
interpret: n.山峰，乘用马，框，衬纸；vi.增长，骑上（马）；vt.提升，爬上，装备
example: 单词 mount 的例句||||Their debts continued to mount up. 他们的债务不断增加。||||She is the first woman who steps on the top of Mount Jolmo Lungma. 她是第一个登上珠穆朗玛峰的女人。

name: pope
interpret: n.（罗马天主教的）教皇
example: 单词 pope 的例句||||The Pope is the spiritual leader of many Christians. 教皇是众多基督徒的宗教领袖。||||The Pope is the supreme leader of the Roman Catholic Church. 教皇是罗马天主教的最高领袖。

name: tuition
interpret: n.（某一学科的）教学，讲授，指导，学费
example: 单词 tuition 的例句||||Students can apply for individual tuition. 学生可以申请个别指导。||||Is this money enough for the tuition fee? 这些钱交学费够吗？

name: hemisphere
interpret: n.半球，半球地图
example: 单词 hemisphere 的例句||||This animal is to be found only in the Southern Hemisphere. 这种动物只有在南半球才能找到。||||In most people, the left hemisphere is bigger than the right. 多数人的左脑比右脑大。

name: feast
interpret: n.盛宴，筵席，节日
example: 单词 feast 的例句||||After the feast she spent a week dieting to salve her conscience. 大吃了一顿之后，她花了一周时间节食以安慰自己。||||You shouldn't have troubled yourself to prepare such a feast? 你不该准备这样丰盛的饭菜, 这样太麻烦你了?

name: alongside
interpret: adv.在旁边；prep.和...在一起，在...旁边
example: 单词 alongside 的例句||||There was a butcher's shop alongside the theatre. 剧院旁边有一家肉店。||||Alongside of him stood his uncle. 他的身旁站着他叔叔。

name: awkward
interpret: adj.笨拙的，尴尬的，使用不便的，难处理的
example: 单词 awkward 的例句||||John is so shy and awkward that everyone notices him. 约翰如此害羞狼狈，以至于大家都注意到了他。||||I was the only man among the guests and felt rather awkward. 作为客人中的唯一男性，我有些窘迫。

name: tease
interpret: vt.戏弄，取笑，挑逗，撩拨；n.戏弄人者
example: 单词 tease 的例句||||The other boys tease him because he is fat. 因为他很胖，所以其他男生都取笑他。||||His friends used to tease him about his tatty clothes. 他的朋友过去常常笑话他破旧的衣服。

name: database
interpret: n.数据库 （=databank）
example: 单词 database 的例句||||I discovered some new information in the database. 我在资料库里发现了一些新信息。||||We planned to build an online database. 我们计划建一个联机数据库。

name: canvas
interpret: n.粗帆布，一块油画布
example: 单词 canvas 的例句||||The times that people used canvas boat have become history. 人们用帆船的时代已成为历史。||||Smith painted an oil painting on the canvas. 史密斯在画布上画了一幅油画。

name: fossil
interpret: n.化石，食古不化的人，老顽固
example: 单词 fossil 的例句||||At this distance of time it is difficult to date the fossil. 时间隔得这么久了，很难确定这化石的年代。||||The man is a fossil. 那人是个老顽固。

name: geology
interpret: n.地质学，（某地）地质
example: 单词 geology 的例句||||The students went to study the geology of that region. 学生们去研究那个地区的地质情况。||||In his lecture on geology, he touched on the subject of climate. 他在关于地质学的报告中，也涉及气候问题。

name: immune
interpret: adj.免疫的，有免疫力的，不受影响的，免除的
example: 单词 immune 的例句||||I am immune from the disease, for I had it once. 我对这病有免疫力，因为我已得过一次了。||||Be immune from corruption. 拒腐蚀，永不沾。

name: pregnant
interpret: adj.怀孕的，怀胎的
example: 单词 pregnant 的例句||||She is a pregnant woman. 她是一名孕妇。||||She is pregnant with her first child. 她怀了第一胎。

name: sexual
interpret: adj.性的，两性的，性别的
example: 单词 sexual 的例句||||He was a person of gross sexual appetites. 他是个性欲旺盛的人。||||It is socially irresponsible to refuse young people advice on sexual matters. 拒绝向年轻人提供性方面的建议是对社会不负责任。

name: spectacular
interpret: adj.引人注目的，出色的，与众不同的
example: 单词 spectacular 的例句||||This is a spectacular film. 这是一部场面壮观的电影。||||This is the most spectacular financial crash of the decade. 这是10年里最引人注目的金融破产事件。

name: superb
interpret: adj.高贵的，壮丽的，极好的
example: 单词 superb 的例句||||The large bay has a superb backdrop of mountains. 大海湾背靠着庄严的山脉。||||The hotel has a large dining room serving superb local cuisine. 饭店有一个大餐厅供应上好的当地菜肴。

name: survival
interpret: n.留住生命，生存，残存，幸存者
example: 单词 survival 的例句||||The doctor told my wife I had a fifty-fifty chance of survival. 医生告诉我的妻子，说我活下去的可能性只有50%。||||The old man was a survival of a past age. 这位老人是上一代的遗老。

name: amateur
interpret: adj.业余的，非专业的；n.业余爱好者
example: 单词 amateur 的例句||||He made an amateur attempt to build a cupboard. 他很外行地试做了一个碗柜。||||Although Tom's only an amateur he's a first-class player. 虽然汤姆只是个业余爱好者，但却是一流的高手。

name: cautious
interpret: adj.十分小心的，谨慎的
example: 单词 cautious 的例句||||We should not only be bold, but also be cautious. 我们不仅要大胆，而且要谨慎。||||He was cautious about his work. 他对工作非常谨慎。

name: certainty
interpret: n.必然的事，确定的事实，确信，确实
example: 单词 certainty 的例句||||I can't say with any certainty where I shall be next week. 我不能确切地说下周我在什么地方。||||I know for a certainty that the company has been bought up. 我确实知道公司已经被人收购了。

name: consistent
interpret: adj.坚持的，一贯的，一致的，符合的
example: 单词 consistent 的例句||||He has been a consistent friend to the Chinese people. 他是中国人民始终如一的朋友。||||His actions are always consistent with his words. 他始终言行一致。

name: infectious
interpret: adj.传染的，有传染性的，有感染力的
example: 单词 infectious 的例句||||Influenza is an infectious disease. 流感是一种传染病。||||What an infectious laugh she has? 她的笑声多么具有感染力啊？

name: optimism
interpret: n.乐观，乐观主义
example: 单词 optimism 的例句||||Don't pour cold water on their optimism. 别给他们的乐观态度泼冷水。||||Optimism made him alive through the hard days. 乐观主义使他在艰难的岁月里活了下来。

name: subtle
interpret: adj.难于觉察或描述的，精巧的
example: 单词 subtle 的例句||||Her whole attitude had undergone a subtle change. 她的整个态度发生了微妙的变化。||||There's a subtle hint of garlic in the sauce. 调味汁里稍微有一点蒜味。

name: uneasy
interpret: adj.心神不安的，担心的，令人不安的
example: 单词 uneasy 的例句||||He feels uneasy today. 他今天心里感到不安。||||She had an uneasy feeling that they were still following her. 她有一种他们仍在跟踪她的不安感觉。

name: diagnose
interpret: vt.诊断，判断
example: 单词 diagnose 的例句||||It provides a new method for early diagnose of breast cancer. 为临床早期诊断乳腺癌提供一个新的检查手段。||||What more will you want to know to diagnose this problem? 要弄清这个问题，你还需要知道些什么？

name: disable
interpret: vt.使丧失能力，使伤残
example: 单词 disable 的例句||||One bomb can disable a ship. 一颗炸弹就能炸毁一艘船。||||Job applications from disable workers poured in at a staggering rate. 残废工人求职申请书大批涌来、数量惊人。

name: disrupt
interpret: adj.分裂的，分散的；vt.使分裂，使瓦解
example: 单词 disrupt 的例句||||The war seemed likely to disrupt the state. 战争可能使这个国家分裂。||||The conflict seemed likely to disrupt the government. 这场冲突可能使政府垮台。

name: circulation
interpret: n.循环，流通，传播，发行，发行量
example: 单词 circulation 的例句||||There is a large circulation in the musical public. 在音乐界销路很广。||||The ideas have been in circulation for some time. 这些想法已经流行了一段时间。

name: contaminate
interpret: v.弄污，弄脏，毒害，传染，染污
example: 单词 contaminate 的例句||||All over the world, oil spills regularly contaminate coasts. 在世界各地，油溢出物经常污染着海岸。||||The sources of organisms that may contaminate the wound are numerous. 可以沾染伤口的细菌来源是很多的。

name: insane
interpret: adj.蠢极的，荒唐的，精神错乱的，疯狂的
example: 单词 insane 的例句||||Insane people are sometimes dangerous. 精神病人有时非常危险。||||The letter made her insane with jealousy. 那封信使她妒忌得发疯。

name: revive
interpret: vi. 复兴；复活；苏醒；恢复精神 vt. 使复兴；使苏醒；回想起；重演，重播
example: 单词 revive 的例句||||These flowers will revive in water. 这些花在水中会再活。||||They managed to revive the injured driver with cardiac massage. 他们通过心脏按压使受伤的司机苏醒了过来。

name: virtual
interpret: adj.实质上的，事实上的，实际上的
example: 单词 virtual 的例句||||This reply is a virtual acceptance of our offer. 这一回答实质上是接受了我们的建议。||||At that time the East India Company was the virtual ruler of Bengal. 那时东印度公司是孟加拉的实际统治者。

name: applaud
interpret: vt.鼓掌欢迎，赞同；vi.鼓掌欢迎，欢呼
example: 单词 applaud 的例句||||The pupils that had been watching started to applaud. 一直在一旁观看的小学生们开始鼓起掌来。|||| Please don't applaud until everyone has performed. 请在每个人表演完毕后再鼓掌。

name: incredible
interpret: adj.难以置信的，不可信的，极好的，大量的
example: 单词 incredible 的例句||||Some planets run at incredible speed. 某些星球以难以置信的速度运行着。||||Her answer showed the most incredible stupidity. 她的回答显示出不可思议的愚蠢。

name: shortage
interpret: n.缺少，缺乏，不足
example: 单词 shortage 的例句||||The city is suffering a desperate shortage of water. 这个城市严重缺水。||||The heart of the problem is a shortage of funds. 问题的关键是缺乏经费。

name: boom
interpret: n.隆隆声；vt.发隆隆声
example: 单词 boom 的例句||||The country is having a great boom in industry. 这个国家的工业正蓬勃发展。||||Boom?  Boom?  Boom?  A series of explosions shook the valley. 轰？轰？轰？一连串爆破声震撼山谷。

name: scar
interpret: n.伤疤，伤痕，创伤
example: 单词 scar 的例句||||This scar is from the bite of a dog. 这是狗咬后留下的伤疤。||||The tragedy left a scar on her mind. 这个悲剧给她造成精神上的创伤。

name: hazard
interpret: n.危险，危害；vt.冒...的危险，使遭危险
example: 单词 hazard 的例句||||He climbed into the car at the hazard of his life. 他冒着生命危险进了汽车。||||I think we have provided for every possible hazard. 我认为我们已经准备好了应付每一种可能的危险。

name: mistress
interpret: n.（文学用语）使男子为之倾倒的女人，女主人
example: 单词 mistress 的例句||||Does his wife know he has a mistress? 他的妻子知道他有一个情妇吗？ ||||Is your mistress at home? 你家女主人在家吗？

name: radioactive
interpret: adj.放射性的
example: 单词 radioactive 的例句||||People should keep away from the radioactive waste. 人们应远离放射性废物。||||The radioactive material is stored in a special radiation-proof container. 放射性材料储存在防辐射的特殊容器里。

name: snatch
interpret: n.抢夺，碎片，一阵，一瞬间，一点点；v.夺取，抢劫，抓住
example: 单词 snatch 的例句||||The magazine was snatch from my hand before I could read it. 我还没来得及看那期杂志，就被从我手里抢走了。||||He had a snatch of sleep sitting in his chair. 他坐在椅子里稍睡片刻。

name: oppress
interpret: v.压迫，压制某人，使（心情等）沉重，使烦恼
example: 单词 oppress 的例句||||A good ruler will not oppress the poor. 好的统治者不会压迫贫民。||||The imperialists exploit and oppress all the peoples of the world. 帝国主义者剥削和压迫全世界人民。

name: edit
interpret: vt.编辑，校订，主编，编辑，剪辑（影片等）
example: 单词 edit 的例句||||You'll have to edit that tape, it's too long. 那盘录音带太长，你得把它剪辑一下。||||It is not yet decided who will edit it. 由谁校订未决。

name: split
interpret: n.劈开，裂片，裂口；adj.分散的；v.分离，分开，劈开
example: 单词 split 的例句||||Who told you that Mary and I had split up? 谁告诉你玛丽和我已经离婚了？ ||||The teacher split the class up into six groups. 老师把班级分成6个小组。

name: repay
interpret: vi. 偿还；报答；报复 vt. 回报；报复；付还
example: 单词 repay 的例句||||I feel honor bound to repay the money I borrowed. 我觉得有责任归还我借的钱。||||I must repay her for her kindness. 我必须报答她的恩惠。

name: glare
interpret: vi.怒目而视，发射强光；n.强光，怒视，炫耀
example: 单词 glare 的例句||||Don't glare at me like that, you deserved the scolding. 不要那么瞪着我，你本该受到训斥的。||||The glare from the fire lit up the sky. 火光照亮了天空。

name: clause
interpret: n.（正式文件或法律文件的）条款，从句，分句
example: 单词 clause 的例句||||The sentence consists of a main clause and a subordinate clause. 这句中有一个主句和一个从句。|||| What clause do you require in the contract? 你要求在合同中订上什么条款？

name: fitting
interpret: n.[pl.]设备，家具，配件，试穿；adj.适合的
example: 单词 fitting 的例句||||I'm going to a fitting tomorrow. 明天我要去试穿新衣。||||The President's address was a fitting end to a bitter campaign. 总统的讲话为一场激烈的竞选运动适时画上了句号。

name: hook
interpret: vt.钩住；n.钩子，钩状物
example: 单词 hook 的例句||||The blacksmith forged a bar of iron into a hook. 铁匠把一根铁条锻造成一个钩子。||||He hangs up his scarf on the hook behind the door. 他把围巾挂在门后的衣钩上。

name: panel
interpret: n.面，板，专门小组，控制板，仪表盘
example: 单词 panel 的例句||||The unusual control panel on the walls caught our attention. 墙上不同寻常的控制板引起了我们的注意。|||| The panel of judges included several well-known writers. 评判小组中包括几位知名作家。

name: incidentally
interpret: adv.附带地，顺便提及
example: 单词 incidentally 的例句||||Incidentally, I think you still owe me some money. 顺便说一句，我想你还欠我一些钱。|||| Incidentally, here's a good piece of news. 附带告诉你一个好消息。

name: inflation
interpret: n.胀大，夸张，通货膨胀
example: 单词 inflation 的例句||||Gold prices are often seen as an indicator of inflation. 黃金价格常常被看作是通货膨胀的指标。||||The inflation of the airbed took several minutes. 给空气床垫充气花了几分钟时间。

name: initial
interpret: adj.最初的，开始的，词首的；n.首字母，姓名的开头字母；vt.标注姓名的首字母于
example: 单词 initial 的例句||||After she'd overcome her initial shyness, she became very friendly. 她克服了起初的羞怯之后，变得十分友善。||||The experiments have given initial results eventually. 那些试验总算初见成效了。

name: offence
interpret: n.犯法（行为），罪过，过错
example: 单词 offence 的例句||||She felt she had committed an offence against the right of others. 她觉得自己侵犯了他人的权利。||||I agree with the theorem that the best defence is offence. 我同意最好的防御是进攻的理论。

name: qualify
interpret: vt.取得资格，有资格，限定，描述；vi.取得资格，有资格
example: 单词 qualify 的例句||||I won't qualify until next year. 我明年才具备资格。||||You must qualify yourself for the post. 你必须使自己具备担任这一工作的资格。

name: negotiate
interpret: v.洽谈，协商，谈判，顺利通过，成功越过
example: 单词 negotiate 的例句||||I'll negotiate with their coach on the date of the match. 我将与他们的教练磋商比赛的日期问题。||||I managed to negotiate successfully with the authorities. 我设法同当局进行了成功的协商。

name: agenda
interpret: n.议事日程，记事册
example: 单词 agenda 的例句||||We now proceed to the next item on the agenda. 我们现在着手讨论下一项议题。||||If there is no objection, the agenda is adopted. 如果没有意见，议程就通过了。

name: ambiguous
interpret: adj.引起歧义的，模棱两可的，含糊不清的
example: 单词 ambiguous 的例句||||This sentence is ambiguous in sense. 这个句子意思不清楚。|||| The title of this chapter is ambiguous. 这一章的标题含义模糊。

name: ample
interpret: adj.充分的，富裕的，宽敞的，宽大的
example: 单词 ample 的例句||||Let's produce ample food and clothing with our own hands. 自己动手，丰衣足食。|||| The supply is ample and prices are stable. 供应充沛，物价稳定。

name: betray
interpret: vt.背叛，失信于，泄露，暴露
example: 单词 betray 的例句||||He promised never to betray the organization. 他发誓永不背叛组织。||||Keep calm. Don't betray your identity. 沉住气，别可露馅儿。

name: catholic
interpret: adj.天主教的；n.天主教徒
example: 单词 catholic 的例句||||The Pope is the supreme leader of the Roman Catholic Church. 教皇是罗马天主教的最高领袖。||||She was a devoutly Catholic. 她是一个虔诚地天主教徒。

name: commission
interpret: n.委托，授权，委员会，拥金，回扣，委任状
example: 单词 commission 的例句||||The salesman can get commission on everything he sells. 这个售货员能得到所售每件货物的佣金。||||The commission is made up of five people, including two women. 委员会由五人组成，其中包括两名妇女。

name: conservative
interpret: adj.保守的，守旧的；n.保守的人，保守派
example: 单词 conservative 的例句||||He is a conservative member of the church. 他是一个守旧教会教友。||||The young man is very conservative. 这个年轻人很守旧。

name: striking
interpret: adj.显著的，惹人注目的，容貌出众的
example: 单词 striking 的例句||||There is a striking difference between Jane and Mary. 简和玛丽之间有显著的差异。||||What is immediately striking is how resourceful the children are. 最令人注目的是孩子们的机智聪明。

name: distract
interpret: vt.分散注意力，转移注意力，使分心
example: 单词 distract 的例句||||Don't distract my attention. 不要分散我的注意力。||||It was all a ploy to distract attention from his real aims. 那纯粹是障眼法，用以分散人们对他真正意图的注意力。

name: generate
interpret: vt.生成，产生（光、热、电等）导致
example: 单词 generate 的例句||||We need someone to generate new ideas. 我们需要有人出新主意。||||This book will continue to generate excitement for a long time. 这本书将在很长一段时间里继续使人们为之激动。

name: offspring
interpret: n.子女，子孙，后代，（动物的）崽
example: 单词 offspring 的例句||||Jack is her only offspring. 杰克是她唯一的后代。|||| This device is the offspring of his inventive mind. 这一装置是他那长于发明的头脑的产儿。

name: priest
interpret: n.神父，牧师，司铎，司祭，领导者，神甫；vt.使成为神职人员
example: 单词 priest 的例句||||He confessed to a priest that he had sinned. 他向神父忏悔他犯了罪。||||The priest visited all the old people in the parish. 牧师探望了教区里的所有老人。

name: interior
interpret: adj.在内的，内部的，内地的，国内的；n.内部
example: 单词 interior 的例句||||There is water in the interior of the cave. 在山洞的内部有水。||||They went into the interior room. 他们进了内室。

name: obligation
interpret: n.（法律、道德上的）义务，责任
example: 单词 obligation 的例句||||Every player is under an obligation to keep the rules. 每个选手都必须遵守这些规则。||||It is the obligation of citizens to perform military service. 服兵役是每个公民的义务。

name: pursuit
interpret: n.追赶，追求，职业，工作
example: 单词 pursuit 的例句||||They set off at once along the lane in pursuit. 他们立即出发沿着小巷追赶。||||Life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness have been called the inalienable rights of man. 生命、自由和追求幸福被称为人类不可剥夺的权利。

name: reverse
interpret: n. 背面；相反；倒退；失败 vt. 颠倒；倒转 adj. 反面的；颠倒的；反身的 vi. 倒退；逆叫
example: 单词 reverse 的例句||||His answer was just the reverse of what I expected. 他的回答正好与我期望的相反。||||Please reverse the positions of two pictures. 请把两张图片的位置倒转过来。

name: profitable
interpret: adj.有益的，能带来利益的，有利可图的
example: 单词 profitable 的例句||||That business became profitable last year. 那项生意去年变得很赚钱。||||The convention business is very profitable for the hotel industry. 承办会议业务能给旅馆业带来很高的利润。

name: refugee
interpret: n.难民，流亡者
example: 单词 refugee 的例句||||The refugee was condemned to a life of wandering. 这个难民注定要过流浪的生活。||||The refugee is suffering for want of food and medical supplies. 难民苦于缺少食物和医药用品。

name: sophisticated
interpret: adj.老练的，精密的，尖端的，高雅的
example: 单词 sophisticated 的例句||||She has become very sophisticated since she went to live in London. 移居伦敦后她变得世故多了。|||| This is a very sophisticated machine. 这是一台非常精密的机器。

name: applause
interpret: n.鼓掌，喝彩，赞许
example: 单词 applause 的例句||||His appearance on the platform was greeted with a burst of applause. 他一登上台就博得了一阵热烈的掌声。||||His speech won round after round of enthusiastic applause. 他的演讲博得了一阵又一阵的热烈掌声。

name: inferior
interpret: adj.劣等的，次的，下级的；n.下级，下属
example: 单词 inferior 的例句||||These oranges are inferior to those I bought last week. 这些桔子没我上个周买的好。||||They sell inferior goods at that store. 那家商店卖劣等货。

name: initiative
interpret: n.主动性，首创精神，主动权（的行动），倡议
example: 单词 initiative 的例句||||He went to see the headmaster on his own initiative. 他主动去看望校长。||||His employer had described him as lacking in initiative and drive. 雇主说他缺乏进取心和干劲。

name: emerge
interpret: vi.（从水中等）出来，出现，浮现，形成
example: 单词 emerge 的例句||||The baby's head was starting to emerge from the womb. 婴儿的头开始从母亲的子宮中露出来。||||It's still hard to tell who will emerge victorious. 鹿死谁手尚难逆料。

name: recommendation
interpret: n.推荐（信）建议，优点，长处
example: 单词 recommendation 的例句||||I wrote him a good recommendation. 我为他写了一封很好的推荐信。||||This method deserves recommendation. 这种做法值得提倡。

name: nightmare
interpret: n.恶梦，可怕的事物，无法摆脱的恐惧
example: 单词 nightmare 的例句||||I was glad to awake from such a nightmare. 我庆幸终于从噩梦中醒来了。||||I had a nightmare last nightand, lost sleep. 昨夜我作了个恶梦，失眠了。

name: barely
interpret: adv.仅仅，几乎没有，几乎不
example: 单词 barely 的例句||||The male bird is barely distinguishable from the female. 雄鸟和雌鸟几乎无法辨别。||||He took barely enough money to keep the children in bread. 他赚很少的钱仅够孩子们勉强糊口。

name: decay
interpret: vi.腐烂，衰落；n.腐烂，腐朽，衰败状态
example: 单词 decay 的例句||||The vegetables have begun to decay. 那些蔬菜已开始腐烂。||||Our powers decay in old age. 我们的体力在老年时就衰退。

name: gamble
interpret: n.冒险；v.赌博，孤注一掷
example: 单词 gamble 的例句||||Setting up this business was a bit of a gamble. 开办这样的公司有点冒险。||||Drive carefully and don't gamble with your life. 小心驾驶，别拿你的生命冒险。

name: editorial
interpret: adj.编者的，社论的；n.（报刊的）社论，重要评论
example: 单词 editorial 的例句||||For a full hour they argued over the wording of the editorial. 他们为社论的措辞争论了一个小时。||||We now bring you the full text of the Renmin Ribao editorial. 现在全文广播《人民日报》社论。

name: ignorance
interpret: n.无知，愚昧，不了解，（of，about）不知道
example: 单词 ignorance 的例句||||The relation of disease to poverty and ignorance is easy to see. 疾病与贫穷、无知之间的关系是显而易见的。||||Maybe it is all due to my own ignorance. 也许是我少见多怪。

name: jury
interpret: n.陪审团，评委会；adj.临时用的；vt.挑选
example: 单词 jury 的例句||||These twelve men are believed to compose the jury. 据信，陪审团是由这12人组成的。||||The members of the jury were discharged from their duties. 陪审员们被解除了职务。

name: objective
interpret: adj.客观的；n.目标，目的
example: 单词 objective 的例句||||He tried to take an objective view of the situation. 他试图对形势有个客观的看法。||||The cultivation in good taste is our main objective. 培养高雅情趣是我们的主要目标。

name: pave
interpret: vt.给（道路路面）铺上石板或砖
example: 单词 pave 的例句||||The town council decided to pave the square before the Hall. 市议会决定把市政厅前的广场铺上石板。||||I believe this treaty will pave the way to peace in Europe. 我相信这个条约将为欧洲的和平铺平道路。

name: readily
interpret: adv.欣然地，容易地，很快地，立即
example: 单词 readily 的例句||||I promise all costs will be readily returned. 我保证所有的费用会迅速偿还。||||Most plastics do not readily conduct heat or electricity. 大多数塑料不易传热或导电。

name: rear
interpret: vt.抚养，饲养；n.后部，后面
example: 单词 rear 的例句||||We had to rear it in a nursery and plant it out. 我们不得不在苗棚里培育它，然后再把它移植出来。||||The hall is in the rear of the building. 礼堂在大楼的后部。

name: youngster
interpret: n.儿童，少年，年轻人
example: 单词 youngster 的例句||||I rode the youngster on my back. 我让小孩骑在背上。||||That youngster works with a will. 这小伙子干活有股傻劲儿。

name: adjacent
interpret: adj.（to）邻近的，毗连的
example: 单词 adjacent 的例句||||These young students lives in adjacent rooms. 这些年轻的学生住在毗连的房间里。||||The house adjacent to ours is under repairs. 与我家相邻的房子正在修缮。

name: cluster
interpret: n.串，簇，群，组；vi.群集，丛生；vt.集中
example: 单词 cluster 的例句||||She held a cluster of flowers in her arms. 她抱着一束鲜花。||||A cluster of tourists was surrounded in the hill. 一群游客被困在了山中。

name: collide
interpret: vi.碰撞，互撞，冲突，抵触
example: 单词 collide 的例句||||The interests of the two countries collide. 两国的利益发生冲突。||||The tides slide on the tidy wide beach and collide each other. 海潮在整洁宽阔的海滩上滑行并相互碰撞。

name: evaporate
interpret: vi.蒸发，挥发，消失；vt.使蒸发，使挥发
example: 单词 evaporate 的例句||||Clearly, the star wars problem was not going to evaporate. 显然，星球大战问题并没有不了了之。||||It will evaporate like a spirit. 它将来总要像幽灵一样化成云烟。

name: harsh
interpret: adj.严厉（酷）的，刺耳的，刺目的，毛糙的
example: 单词 harsh 的例句||||The sunlight is very harsh. 太阳光很刺眼。||||Although his words are harsh, there is positiveness in them. 虽然他的话很苛刻，但有建设性。

name: overwhelm
interpret: vt.使受不了，使不知所措，征服，制服
example: 单词 overwhelm 的例句||||No difficulty can overwhelm us. 困难压不倒我们。|||| After my lecture, the students began to overwhelm me with questions. 讲课之后, 学生们开始问一系列问题，使我不知所措。

name: humanity
interpret: n.人类，[总称]人(性)，人道[pl.]人文学科
example: 单词 humanity 的例句||||Such an act is a disgrace to humanity. 这种行为是人类的耻辱。||||We should treat animals with humanity. 我们应该以仁慈之心对待动物。

name: equivalent
interpret: adj.（to）相等的，等价的；n.相等物，等值物
example: 单词 equivalent 的例句||||Nodding your head is equivalent to saying "yes". 点头就等于说”赞同”。||||You will receive the full equivalent of your money. 你将收到与你的款项价值完全同等的物品。

name: loosen
interpret: vt.放松，松开，解除（便秘等），放宽；vi.变松，松弛
example: 单词 loosen 的例句||||I must take some exercise and loosen up my muscles. 我必须活动活动使肌肉放松些。||||The medicine may loosen your cough. 这种药能减轻你的咳嗽。

name: assurance
interpret: n.把握，信心，保证，（人寿）保险
example: 单词 assurance 的例句||||The young teacher lacked assurance in front of his class. 这位青年教师在学生面前缺少自信心。||||He has a life assurance. 他投保了人寿保险。

name: seemingly
interpret: adv.从表面上看起来，似乎是
example: 单词 seemingly 的例句||||Seemingly, we can do nothing to prevent this from happening. 我们似乎没有什么办法阻止这件事发生。||||For several seemingly interminable seconds no one spoke. 有几秒钟没有人讲话，这几秒钟似乎十分漫长。

name: snap
interpret: n.啪地移动，突然断掉；v.猛咬，咬断，谩骂，砰然关上
example: 单词 snap 的例句||||He broke off the twig with a snap. 他啪地一声把那根树枝折断了。||||These earrings snap on with special fasteners. 这副耳环是用特制的按扣扣上去的。

name: strive
interpret: vi.努力，奋斗，力争
example: 单词 strive 的例句||||Don't strive merely for quantity of production. 在生产中不要单纯地追求数量。||||The scientists strive for a breakthrough in cancer research. 科学家们力争在癌症研究方面有个突破。

name: buzz
interpret: vt. 使嗡嗡叫；暗中散布 vi. 作嗡嗡声；东奔西忙 n. 嗡嗡声
example: 单词 buzz 的例句||||My brain was in buzz. 我的脑袋嗡嗡响。||||A buzz went through the crowded courtroom. 拥挤的法庭里响起了一片乱哄哄的说话声。

name: locomotive
interpret: adj.运动的，机动
example: 单词 locomotive 的例句||||The wheels were set further back on the original locomotive. 车轮安装得比原来机车的更靠后些。||||A group of enthusiasts have undertaken the reconstruction of a steam locomotive. 一群火车迷已担负起重造蒸汽机车的任务。

name: pedal
interpret: n.踏板；adj.脚的，踏脚的；v.用脚踏动，踩踏板
example: 单词 pedal 的例句||||He pressed down the accelerator pedal of his car. 他踩下汽车的加速器踏板。||||I saw him pedal to school every morning. 我看到他每天早晨骑自行车上学。

name: toss
interpret: n./v.突然抬起，摇摆，扔
example: 单词 toss 的例句||||Let's toss to see who pays it. 让我们来掷钱币决定谁付账吧。||||The matter made him toss in the bed. 那件事使他在床上翻来覆去。

name: stem
interpret: n.茎，干，船首，词干，血统；vt.堵住，阻止，抽去梗；vi.起源于，发生
example: 单词 stem 的例句||||Cut the stem cleanly, just beneath a leaf joint. 把茎切整齐点，正好切在叶根下。||||The ship was in a blaze from stem to stern. 整艘船从头到尾都着火了。

name: appendix
interpret: n.附录，附属物，阑尾，盲肠
example: 单词 appendix 的例句||||I have recently had my appendix removed. 我最近切除了阑尾。||||There is an appendix at the back of the book. 该书末尾处有一附录。

name: bulletin
interpret: n.小报，会刊，简明新闻，新闻快报
example: 单词 bulletin 的例句||||We read the declaration posted on the bulletin board. 我们读了贴在布告板上的声明。|||| The radio bulletin warned of the typhoon. 收音机新闻快报发布了台风警报。

name: intermediate
interpret: adj.中间的，居间的，中级的；n.中间体，媒介物
example: 单词 intermediate 的例句||||This country is now at an intermediate stage of development. 这个国家目前正处于发展的中间阶段。|||| Gray is intermediate between black and white. 灰色介于黑色和白色之间。

name: migrate
interpret: vi.（候鸟等）迁徙，移居（国外），迁移
example: 单词 migrate 的例句||||Many birds migrate south for the winter. 冬天时，许多鸟类迁徙南方。||||The rich people often migrate in winter to Florida. 有钱的人常在冬季搬迁到佛罗里达州去。

name: splash
interpret: vt. 溅，泼；用...使液体飞溅 n. 飞溅的水；污点；卖弄 vi. 溅湿；溅开
example: 单词 splash 的例句||||I fell into the water with a splash. 我跌入水中，激起水花四溅。||||There's a splash of paint on the white wall. 白墙上溅上了一片油漆。

name: shady
interpret: adj.成荫的，多荫的，可疑的，靠不住的
example: 单词 shady 的例句||||This is a shady avenue. 这是条林阴大道。||||He's a rather shady person. 他是个相当靠不住的人。

name: abolish
interpret: vt.废除（法律、习惯等），取消
example: 单词 abolish 的例句||||Do abolish this kind of bad evil. 一定要废除这种恶劣习俗。||||The weapons of war must be abolished before they abolish us. 在作战武器消灭我们以前，我们应先把它消灭。

name: absurd
interpret: adj.荒谬的，荒诞的，荒唐可笑的，不合理的
example: 单词 absurd 的例句||||It is ridiculously absurd to believe that the number 13 is unlucky. 相信数字13是个不吉祥的数字是荒唐可笑的。||||It was absurd of you to do such a thing. 你做那样的事是愚蠢的。

name: acknowledge
interpret: vt.承认...的权威，告知，收到，报偿
example: 单词 acknowledge 的例句||||With so much evidence against him he had to acknowledge his error. 在这么多的证据面前，他不得不承认错误。|||| It is ungracious of me not to acknowledge your help. 你大力帮助而我尚未表示谢意，十分失礼。

name: contradict
interpret: vt.反驳，否认...的真实性，与...发生矛盾
example: 单词 contradict 的例句||||Young children should never contradict what their parents say. 孩子们绝对不应顶撞父母。||||They contradict each other all the time. 他们总是相互抵触。

name: rectangular
interpret: adj.矩形的，成直角的
example: 单词 rectangular 的例句||||He put a rectangular box on the table. 他把一个长方形的箱子放在桌子上。||||The equations are written in rectangular coordinates. 这些方程是在直角座标系中写出的。

name: scan
interpret: n.审视，浏览，扫描，押韵，细查；vt.细看，浏览，扫描，详细调查，信件扫描（指BBS处理直递邮件或会议邮件时，对所有或特定信区做检查的动作）
example: 单词 scan 的例句||||The first scan was bad, so I had to do it again. 第一次扫描不好，所以我得重做。||||A scan determines the position of the baby in the womb. 扫描可以确定胎儿在子宮中的位置。

name: abnormal
interpret: adj.反常的，不正常的，不规则的
example: 单词 abnormal 的例句||||This warm weather is abnormal for February. 二月里这种温暖的天气不太正常。||||That is simply abnormal. 那简直是反常的。

name: alert
interpret: adj.机警的，活泼的，机灵的；vt.使...警觉
example: 单词 alert 的例句||||Drivers must be on the alert for traffic signals. 驾驶员必须密切注意交通信号。||||The rabbit seems to be very alert all its life. 兔子似乎一生都小心翼翼，十分警觉。

name: cherish
interpret: vt.抱有，怀有（希望等），爱护，抚育，珍爱
example: 单词 cherish 的例句||||I cherish for you the liveliest feeling of affection and gratitude. 我对你怀有最强烈的爱和感激之情。||||We must cherish experience acquired at the cost of blood. 我们必须珍惜用鲜血换来的经验。

name: endurance
interpret: n.耐久力，忍耐力，耐久的时期，持续的时间
example: 单词 endurance 的例句||||She reached the end of endurance. 她到了忍受的极限。||||The exercise obviously will improve strength and endurance. 这种锻炼会明显改善体力增加耐力。

name: peer
interpret: n.同辈，同等地位的人，伙伴，贵族；vi.仔细看，费力地看
example: 单词 peer 的例句||||Children are easily influenced by their peer. 孩子很容易受同辈影响。||||He is a peer. 他是一个贵族。

name: myth
interpret: n.神话，神话故事
example: 单词 myth 的例句||||The story has points of resemblance to a Hebrew myth. 这个故事与某个希伯来神话有相似之处。||||The story is a pure myth. 这故事纯属虚构。

name: quiver
interpret: vi.颤抖，抖动；n.颤抖，抖动，颤声
example: 单词 quiver 的例句||||Can you feel a quiver of her hands?  你感觉到她的手在发抖吗？|||| There was a slight quiver in his voice as he spoke. 他说话时声音有些颤抖。

name: resume
interpret: n. 摘要；履历，简历 vt. 重新开始，继续；恢复，重新占用 vi. 重新开始，继续
example: 单词 resume 的例句||||We'll stop now and resume at two o'clock. 我们现在停下来，到两点再干。||||My resume shows that I have the right qualifications for the job. 我的简历表明我正符合这项工作的条件。

name: cricket
interpret: n.蟋蟀，板球运动；adj.公平的
example: 单词 cricket 的例句||||The England cricket team scored quite a useful total. 英格兰板球队得分总数令人满意。||||We could hear the shrill of the midsummer cricket. 我们可以听到仲夏时节蟋蟀的尖叫声。||||Your behaviour isn't cricket. 你的行为不光彩。

name: startle
interpret: vt. 使吓一跳；使惊奇 vi. 惊吓；惊跳；惊奇 n. 惊愕；惊恐
example: 单词 startle 的例句||||Sorry, I didn't mean to startle you. 对不起，我不是故意想吓你一跳的。||||I hope I didn't startle you. 但愿我没有吓着您。

name: combat
interpret: n.战斗，斗争，格斗；vt.与...斗争，与...战斗
example: 单词 combat 的例句||||The police are now using computers to help combat crime. 警方现在使用电脑打击犯罪活动。||||A reporter interviewed the combat hero. 记者访问了这位战斗英雄。

name: linger
interpret: vt.消磨，无所事事；vi.逗留，消磨，徘徊，漫步
example: 单词 linger 的例句||||Don't linger away your holidays, try to find something useful to do. 不要虚度假日，尽量找些有意义的事做。||||His last words still linger in our ears. 他的临终嘱咐仍萦绕在我们耳际。

name: moan
interpret: n.呻吟声，悲叹声，抱怨声；v.呻吟，抱怨
example: 单词 moan 的例句||||From time to time there was a moan of pain from the sick man. 病人不时发出一声声痛苦的呻吟。|||| They moan on a lot about money. 他们对钱的事情抱怨不已。

name: rub
interpret: n.摩擦，困难，障碍，难点，磨损处；vt.擦，搓，摩擦，惹怒；vi.摩擦，擦破
example: 单词 rub 的例句||||Don't let the wire rub up against the pipe. 别让电线碰到管子上。||||He used to rub up against many famous movie stars. 他过去经常偶然碰到许多有名的影星。

name: rip
interpret: n.拉裂，破绽，激流，浪荡子；vt.撕裂，激昂地说，贬损；vi.裂开，仓促地冲过...
example: 单词 rip 的例句||||He had seen the rip in the book. 他看到了书里的裂缝。||||I tried not to rip the paper as I unwrapped it. 我把纸打开的时候，尽量不把它撕破。

name: convert
interpret: v.（在形式、状态、用途等方面）（使）改变
example: 单词 convert 的例句||||I must convert sorrow into strength. 我要化悲痛为力量。||||At what rate does the dollar convert into pounds? 美元以什么汇率兑换成英镑？

name: dazzle
interpret: vt.使昏眩，使惊奇，使赞叹不已，使倾倒
example: 单词 dazzle 的例句||||The dazzle of the spotlights made him ill at ease. 聚光灯的耀眼强光使他局促不安。||||Fame did not dazzle him. 他没有被名望冲昏头脑。

name: occurrence
interpret: n.发生，出现，事件，发生的事件
example: 单词 occurrence 的例句||||Two things account for its occurrence. 发生这件事的原因有两个。||||For a military commander, winning or losing a battle is a common occurrence. 胜败乃兵家常事。

name: dine
interpret: vi.吃饭，进餐；vt.宴请
example: 单词 dine 的例句||||I wish I could afford to dine off fresh meat every day. 我要是能天天吃到新鲜的肉就好了。||||Let's dine out tonight, I'm too tired to cook. 我太累了，不想做饭，今晚咱们到外面吃吧。

name: gorgeous
interpret: adj.华丽的，灿烂的，美丽的，宜人的，棒的
example: 单词 gorgeous 的例句||||The gorgeous costume added to the brilliance of the dance. 华丽的服装使舞蹈更加光彩夺目。||||What a gorgeous day it is today? 今天天气多好啊？

name: criterion
interpret: n.（批评判断的）标准，准据，规范
example: 单词 criterion 的例句||||Only social practice can be the criterion of truth. 只有社会实践才能是检验真理的唯一标准。|||| Practice is the sole criterion for testing truth. 实践是检验真理的唯一标准。

name: stumble
interpret: n.绊倒，失策；vi.绊倒，失策，踌躇，无意中发现；vt.绊倒，困惑
example: 单词 stumble 的例句||||Be grateful to those who have made you stumble, for they have strengthened your ability. 感激绊倒你的人，因为他强化了你的能力。||||You never knew when you might stumble across some new talent. 谁也说不准什么时候会碰上一位新的天才。

name: surpass
interpret: vt.超过，超越，胜过
example: 单词 surpass 的例句||||Young people surpass old men in strength. 年轻人在气力上赛过老年人。||||The latecomers surpass the early starters. 后来居上。

name: acute
interpret: adj.严重的，激烈的，敏锐的，急性的，尖的
example: 单词 acute 的例句||||A period of acute depression can sometimes follow childbirth. 分娩之后可能会有一段时间的急性抑郁期。|||| The publication comes as the answer to an acute demand. 这一出版物是为满足急需而出版的。

name: disguise
interpret: vt.把...假扮起来；n.伪装物，假装，伪装
example: 单词 disguise 的例句||||He went about in the disguise of a sailor. 他伪装成海员到处流窜。||||It is impossible to disguise the fact that business is bad. 生意不好这件事无法隐瞒。

name: distinct
interpret: adj.种类不同的，有区别的，清楚的，明显的
example: 单词 distinct 的例句||||I had the distinct impression that I was being followed. 我清楚地感觉到有人跟踪我。||||The party split into two distinct groups. 该党分裂成两个截然不同的团体。

name: colonel
interpret: n.(英国陆军、美国陆空军及海军陆战队)上校
example: 单词 colonel 的例句||||It's a pity we didn't mend our fences with the colonel. 可惜我们还没有和上校先生调整好关系。||||An army major ranks between a captain and a colonel. 陆军少校的军阶在上尉与中校之间。

name: tentative
interpret: adj.试验性质的，暂时的，犹豫不决的
example: 单词 tentative 的例句||||I have some tentative suggestions. 我有几点不成熟的想法。||||Please come out with your tentative ideas at the meeting. 请把你的初步设想在会上讲一讲。

name: odour
interpret: n.气味，香气，风味，味道，声誉，名气
example: 单词 odour 的例句||||The poor boy smelled the delicious odour of cooked meat. 这可怜的孩子闻到了香喷喷的肉味。||||The Parliament was in bad odour among the people. 该国议会在百姓心目中已是声名狼藉。

name: paralyze
interpret: vt.使瘫痪，使丧失作用，使呆若木鸡
example: 单词 paralyze 的例句||||The fear that you might make a mistake or fail in your efforts can paralyze your progress. 担心你可能会犯错或者你的努力将会失败，这会阻碍你的进步。||||The snake uses its venom to stun or paralyze its victims. 蛇用其毒液使受害者失去知觉或瘫痪。

name: decent
interpret: adj.象样的，不错的，体面的，正派的，恰当的
example: 单词 decent 的例句||||We want to raise our children to be decent men and women. 我们盼望把孩子们培养成优秀人才。||||There isn't even a decent table in this room. 这屋里连张像样的桌子也没有。

name: conception
interpret: n.思想，观念，概念，构想，设想，怀孕
example: 单词 conception 的例句||||He's got a pretty strange conception of friendship. 他对友谊有一种非常独特的见解。||||A good novelist needs great power of conception. 一个好的小说家需要丰富的想象力。

name: enclosure
interpret: n.围绕，圈地，围场，围墙，附件，封入物
example: 单词 enclosure 的例句||||We were led to a fenced enclosure. 我们被带到一处用篱笆围住的场地。||||I received your enclosure with gratitude. 附件收到, 十分感谢。

name: cradle
interpret: n.摇篮，策源地，支船架；vt.把...放在摇篮里
example: 单词 cradle 的例句||||The baby was rocked to sleep in a cradle. 婴儿在摇篮里被摇得睡着了。||||Tokyo was the cradle of Japanese culture. 东京是日本文化的发源地。

name: limb
interpret: n.树枝，四肢，枝干，边缘；vt.切断手足，切断树干
example: 单词 limb 的例句||||She sat on a limb of the tree and looked down. 她坐在一根大树枝上往下看。||||His refusal to agree left him out on a limb. 他拒不表示同意，致使自己处于孤立地位。

name: correspondence
interpret: n.信件，通信（联系）符合，一致，相似
example: 单词 correspondence 的例句||||He showed me all the correspondence relating to the matter. 他把与这件事有关的全部信件都给我看了。|||| What she has just said isn't in correspondence with the views of the majority. 她刚才所说的同大多数人所持的观点不一致。

name: cue
interpret: n.暗示，信号，提示；vt.提示，暗示
example: 单词 cue 的例句||||When she coughs, it's my cue to come onto the stage. 她一咳嗽，就是给我暗号出场。||||The actor missed his cue and came onto the stage late. 这演员错过了向他发出的提示，上场晚了。

name: nourish
interpret: vt.滋养，给予营养，养育，持有或怀有
example: 单词 nourish 的例句||||They needed good food to nourish their bodies. 他们需要好食品滋养身体。||||I could find nothing to nourish my suspicion. 我找不到任何怀疑的根据。

name: mob
interpret: n.暴民，民众，暴徒；v.大举包围，乱挤，围攻
example: 单词 mob 的例句||||The king was burned in effigy by the angry mob. 国王的模拟像被愤怒的民众烧掉以泄心中的愤恨。||||An angry mob is attacking the palace. 愤怒的暴徒在攻击王宫。

name: blast
interpret: vt.炸毁，摧毁；n.爆炸，爆破，一阵，汽笛声
example: 单词 blast 的例句||||A huge bomb blast rocked central London last night. 昨晚一次剧烈的炸弹爆炸震动了伦敦市中心。||||Not until last week was the project in full blast. 工程直到上星期才全部开工。

name: boost
interpret: n.鼓励，激励，提高；v.鼓励，使增强信心
example: 单词 boost 的例句||||This will be a great boost to the economy. 这对于经济发展将是一个巨大的促进。||||These changes will help to boost share prices. 这些变化将有助于提高股票价格。

name: probe
interpret: n.探针，调查，查究；v.探索，查究
example: 单词 probe 的例句||||A doctor used a probe to remove metal fragments from a wound. 医生用探针将伤口中的金属碎片取出。||||They will probe deeply into the matter. 他们将深入调查这件事。

name: elapse
interpret: vi.（时间）过去，消逝
example: 单词 elapse 的例句||||As the elapse of time, their feeling warms up stage by stage. 随着时间的推移，他们的感情逐步升温。||||Never elapse in the long river of history? 在历史的长河中, 永不消逝？

name: interact
interpret: vi.相互作用，相互影响，互通信息
example: 单词 interact 的例句||||All things are interrelated and interact on each other. 一切事物互相联系并相互作用。||||The policeman advised the criminal to interact with the police. 警察劝罪犯与警方合作。

name: obscure
interpret: adj.微暗的，难解的，不著名的，（语音学）轻音的；vt.使...阴暗，隐藏，使...含糊，成为含糊的元音；n.暗淡，模糊
example: 单词 obscure 的例句||||The point of his speech is obscure. 他发言的要点模糊不清。||||The joke did not obscure the underlying seriousness of his point. 玩笑并没有掩盖他的观点隐含的严肃性。

name: foster
interpret: vt.收养，培养，促进；adj.收养的，收养孩子的
example: 单词 foster 的例句||||Nowadays young couple sometimes foster. 现今年轻夫妇有时领养别人的孩子。||||The captain did his best to foster a sense of unity among the new recruits. 队长尽力培养新成员之间的团结精神。

name: productivity
interpret: n.生产力，生产率，多产
example: 单词 productivity 的例句||||Farmers are introducing in novations which increase the productivity. 农民们正引进提高生产力的新方法。||||The workers try to put up productivity. 工人设法提高生产率。

name: autonomy
interpret: n.自治，自治权，人身自由，自主权
example: 单词 autonomy 的例句||||Branch managers have full autonomy in their own areas. 分支机构的经理在其管辖范围内有充分的自主权。|||| China has instituted a system of regional autonomy in minority areas. 中国在少数民族聚居地区实行民族区域自治。

name: trait
interpret: n.显著特点，特性
example: 单词 trait 的例句||||Creativity is a human trait. 创造力是人类的一种特性。||||Repose of manner is an estimable trait in a horse. 神情镇定是一匹马可贵的特质。

name: privacy
interpret: n.私人权利，个人自由，隐私权
example: 单词 privacy 的例句||||In such matters, privacy is impossible. 在这类事情中，保密是不可能的。||||She wept in the privacy of her own room. 她在自己房内暗暗落泪。

name: dominate
interpret: v.支配，统治，高出，俯视，在...中占首地位
example: 单词 dominate 的例句||||They had the ambition to dominate this small country. 他们有控制这个小国的野心。||||The strong usually dominate over the weak. 强者常常支配弱者。

name: exposition
interpret: n.说明，讲解，展览（会），陈列
example: 单词 exposition 的例句||||John gave a very exposition of the facts. 约翰把事实解释得很清楚。||||His pictures were shown at the Paris exposition of 1878. 他的画在1878年巴黎博览会上展览过。

name: inlet
interpret: n.小湾，海湾，入口，进口；vt.引进，插入
example: 单词 inlet 的例句||||There is an inlet to a parking lot. 那儿有一个停车场的入口。||||They went to a fishing village on a small inlet of the sea. 他们去了小海湾边的一个渔村。

name: peck
interpret: vi. 啄食；扔石头；吹毛求疵 vt. 啄食；n. 许多；配克（容量单位，等于2加仑）；啄痕；快速轻吻
example: 单词 peck 的例句||||The cock gave me a peck. 那只公鸡啄了我一下。||||She gave him a light peck of farewell. 她给了他一个匆匆的吻道别。

name: reckon
interpret: vt.计算，估计，认为；vi.计（算），判断，依靠
example: 单词 reckon 的例句||||Don't reckon upon your relatives to help you out of trouble. 不要指望你的亲戚会帮助你摆脱困境。||||I reckon that he is rather too old to marry again. 我认为他的年龄太大，不太适于再婚。

name: eccentric
interpret: adj.古怪的，怪癖的，异乎寻常的；n.古怪的人
example: 单词 eccentric 的例句||||His actions since that morning have been eccentric and unpredictable. 自从那天早晨，他的行动一直是反常而不可捉摸。||||He had the name of an eccentric. 他有怪人之称。

name: flatter
